original:
Most spells require the Magic action to cast, but some spells require a Bonus Action, a Reaction, or 1 minute or more. A spell’s Casting Time entry specifies which of those is required.

One Spell with a Spell Slot per Turn

On a turn, you can expend only one spell slot to cast a spell. This rule means you can’t, for example, cast a spell with a spell slot using the Magic action and another one using a Bonus Action on the same turn.

Reaction and Bonus Action Triggers

A spell that has a casting time of a Reaction is cast in response to a trigger that is defined in the spell’s Casting Time entry. Some spells that have a casting time of a Bonus Action are also cast in response to a trigger defined in the spell.

Longer Casting Times

Certain spells—including a spell cast as a Ritual—require more time to cast: minutes or even hours. While you cast a spell with a casting time of 1 minute or more, you must take the Magic action on each of your turns, and you must maintain &Reference[Concentration] while you do so. If your Concentration is broken, the spell fails, but you don’t expend a spell slot. To cast the spell again, you must start over.
translation:
大多数法术需要使用魔法动作来施放，但有些法术需要附赠动作、反应或 1 分钟以上。法术的施法时间条目指定了所需的行动类型。

法术消耗法术位每回合仅一次

在一个回合中，你只能消耗一个法术位来施展法术。举例来说，这个规则意味着在同一回合中，你不能既消耗法术位以魔法动作施法，又用附赠动作消耗另一个施法。

反应和附赠动作的触发条件

一个施法时间为反应的法术是在法术的施法时间条目中定义的触发条件下施放的。一些施法时间为附赠动作的法术也是在法术的施法时间条目中定义的触发条件下施放的。

长时间施法

某些法术（包括进行仪式施法的法术）要数分钟甚至数小时来进行施放。当你施放一个施法时间为 1 分钟或更长的法术时，你必须在你的每个回合中采取魔法行动，并且在这样做的同时必须保持专注（见规则术语表）。如果你的专注被打断，法术会失败，但你不会消耗法术位。要再次施放法术，你必须重新开始。

original:
A spell’s range indicates how far from the spellcaster the spell’s effect can originate, and the spell’s description specifies which part of the effect is limited by the range.

A range usually takes one of the following forms:

Distance. The range is expressed in feet.

Touch. The spell’s effect originates on something the spellcaster must touch, as defined in the spell.

Self. The spell is cast on the spellcaster or emanates from them, as specified in the spell.

If a spell has movable effects, they aren’t restricted by its range unless the spell’s description says otherwise.
translation:
施法距离

法术的施法距离是施法者能将法术效应源点投射的最远距离，且法术的详述中会列出该法术中的哪部分效应受该距离限制。

法术的施法距离通常有以下几种形式：

距离。 法术的施法距离以尺数列出。

触碰。 法术的效应必须以施法者所接触的某个事物为源点，具体由此法术本身列出。

自身。 法术在施法者自身施展或从施法者自身弥散，具体由此法术本身列出。

若某个法术包含可以移动的效应，则其移动不受施法距离的限制，除非法术本身另有说明。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh7ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.xst836sykIBcYmhv]

A spell’s components are physical requirements the spellcaster must meet to cast the spell. Each spell’s description indicates whether it requires Verbal (V), Somatic (S), or Material (M) components. If the spellcaster can’t provide one or more of a spell’s components, the spellcaster can’t cast the spell.

Verbal (V)

A Verbal component is the chanting of esoteric words that sound like nonsense to the uninitiated. The words must be uttered in a normal speaking voice. The words themselves aren’t the source of the spell’s power; rather, the particular combination of sounds, with specific pitch and resonance, sets the threads of magic in motion. Thus, a creature who is gagged or in an area of magical silence can’t cast a spell with a Verbal component.

Somatic (S)

A Somatic component is a forceful gesticulation or an intricate set of gestures. A spellcaster must use at least one of their hands to perform these movements.

Material (M)

A Material component is a particular material used in a spell’s casting, as specified in parentheses in the Components entry. These materials aren’t consumed by the spell unless the spell’s description states otherwise. The spellcaster must have a hand free to access them, but it can be the same hand used to perform Somatic components, if any.

If a spell doesn’t consume its materials and doesn’t specify a cost for them, a spellcaster can use a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagComponentPo]{Component Pouch} instead of providing the materials specified in the spell, or the spellcaster can substitute a Spellcasting Focus if the caster has a feature that allows that substitution. To use a Component Pouch, you must have a hand free to reach into it, and to use a Spellcasting Focus, you must hold it unless its description says otherwise (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbEquipment0000.JournalEntryPage.xIDcbjgXOndS8zRl]{chapter 6} for descriptions).

Creating Verbal Components

If you’d like to say a spell’s Verbal component, you may make up the words. However you make them, the goal is to create something that’s easy to say and that doesn’t mean anything in the real world. Consider this method: take the name of the spell, keep only one instance of each of its letters, and rearrange the remaining letters into words. For example, remove the second l from @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} and rearrange the remaining letters to create Ber Fila or Fel Bira.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh7ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.xst836sykIBcYmhv]

法术的成分是施法者施展该法术时必须满足的物理条件。每项法术的描述中都会说明其施展时是否需要言语（V）、姿势（S）、材料（M）成分。施法者只有在满足一项法术所有的成分需求后才能施展相应的法术。

语言 (V)

语言成分是一种咏唱听起来没有任何含义的深奥咒文。虽然这些咒文并不给法术供应魔力，但其特定音高共鸣的声音组合却可以牵动魔法之弦来完成施法。因此，被遮住嘴或者身魔法性的沉默区域中的生物不能施展带有言语成分的法术。

姿势 (S)

施法姿势可能包括一记固定的手印或一整套精巧的动作。施法者必须使用至少一只手来完成这些手势。

材料 (M)

材料成分是施展法术所需的特定材料，法术成分中会注明具体内容。这些材料不会在施法时被消耗，除非法术特别说明。施法者必须有一只空手去完成姿势或材料成分，但完成材料成分的手可以是完成施法姿势的同一只手。

施法者可以使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagComponentPo]（见第六章）或法器（只要施法者具有相应特性）取代法术所指定的材料，除非该法术的材料成分有指定的价格或是会被消耗。要使用材料包，你必须用一只空手从其中取出材料；而要使用法器，你必须并在施法过程中一直握持它，除非法术另有说明（ @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbEquipment0000.JournalEntryPage.xIDcbjgXOndS8zRl]{第 6 章} ）。

创作语言成分

如果你喜欢喊出法术的语言成分，那你可以设计这些词。但是在设计过程中要记住，其内容需要易于说出，且不能有任何现实中的意义。创作语言成分时可以参考以下方法：首先取法术的名字（若出现重复的字母则只取其中一个），并将剩下的字母重组为几个词。例如，移除 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00] 中的第二个L，再将剩余字母重新组合为贝尔·菲拉Ber Fila或费尔·比拉Fel Bira

original:
A spell’s duration is the length of time the spell persists after it is cast. A duration typically takes one of the following forms:

Concentration. A duration that requires Concentration follows the &Reference[Concentration] rules.

Instantaneous. An instantaneous duration means the spell’s magic appears only for a moment and then disappears.

Time Span. A duration that provides a time span specifies how long the spell lasts in rounds, minutes, hours, or the like. For example, a Duration entry might say “1 minute,” meaning the spell ends after 1 minute has passed. While a time-span spell that you cast is ongoing, you can dismiss it (no action required) if you don’t have the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition.
translation:
法术的持续时间即是法术生效的时间长短。持续时间通常有以下几种形式：

专注。 专注法术依 &Reference[Concentration] 规则运行（见规则综述）。   

立即。 立即法术意味着其中魔法只存在了一瞬间，随后便消散。

持续时间段。 持续法术会给出一个时间段，其单位是轮、分钟、小时或者其它。例如，持续时间为“1分钟”意味着法术会在 1 分钟后结束。只要你未处于 &Reference[Incapacitated] 状态，你便可以随时结束一个正在持续的、由你所施展的持续法术（无需动作）。

original:
The effects of a spell are detailed after its duration entry. Those details present exactly what the spell does, which ignores mundane physical laws; any outcomes beyond those effects are under the DM’s purview. Whatever the effects, they typically deal with targets, saving throws, attack rolls, or all three, each of which is detailed below.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh7ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.SFH0FPMq4K4fDOtV caption=false classes="blend-multiply"]

Targets

A typical spell requires the caster to pick one or more targets to be affected by the spell’s magic. A spell’s description says whether the spell targets creatures, objects, or something else.

A Clear Path to the Target. To target something with a spell, a caster must have a clear path to it, so it can’t be behind Total Cover.

Targeting Yourself. If a spell targets a creature of your choice, you can choose yourself unless the creature must be Hostile or specifically a creature other than you.

Areas of Effect. Some spells, such as @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThunderwav]{Thunderwave}, cover an area called an area of effect, which is defined in the rules glossary. The area determines what the spell targets. The description of a spell specifies whether it has an area of effect, which is typically one of these shapes: Cone, Cube, Cylinder, Emanation, Line, or Sphere.

Awareness of Being Targeted. Unless a spell has a perceptible effect, a creature doesn’t know it was targeted by the spell. An effect like lightning is obvious, but a more subtle effect, such as an attempt to read thoughts, goes unnoticed unless a spell’s says otherwise.

Invalid Targets. If you cast a spell on someone or something that can’t be affected by it, nothing happens to that target, but if you used a spell slot to cast the spell, the slot is still expended.

If the spell normally has no effect on a target that succeeds on a saving throw, the invalid target appears to have succeeded on its saving throw, even though it didn’t attempt one (giving no hint that the creature is an invalid target). Otherwise, you perceive that the spell did nothing to the target.

Saving Throws

Many spells specify that a target makes a saving throw to avoid some or all of a spell’s effects. The spell specifies the ability that the target uses for the save and what happens on a success or failure. Here’s how to calculate the DC for your spells:

Spell save DC = 8 + your spellcasting ability modifier + your Proficiency Bonus

Attack Rolls

Some spells require the caster to make an attack roll to determine whether the spell hits a target. Here’s how to calculate the attack modifier for your spells:

Spell attack modifier = your spellcasting ability + your Proficiency Bonus

Combining Spell Effects

The effects of different spells add together while their durations overlap. In contrast, the effects of the same spell cast multiple times don’t combine. Instead, the most potent effect—such as the highest bonus—from those castings applies while their durations overlap. The most recent effect applies if the castings are equally potent and their durations overlap. For example, if two Clerics cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless} on the same target, that target gains the spell’s benefit only once; the target doesn’t receive two bonus dice. But if the durations of the spells overlap, the effect continues until the duration of the second Bless ends.

Identifying an Ongoing Spell

You can try to identify a non-instantaneous spell by its observable effects if its duration is ongoing. To identify it, you must take the Study action and succeed on a [[/check 15 arc]] check.
translation:
法术产生的具体效应会在其持续时间之后给出。其中包含了这道法术能做到什么事情，这通常会忽视物理法则；一道法术能否会产生这些效应之外的结果由dm来决定。无论法术效应具体是什么，其通常都包括选中目标，豁免检定，攻击检定，甚至三者全部（内容见下文）。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh7ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.SFH0FPMq4K4fDOtV caption=false classes="blend-multiply"]

目标

大部分法术都会需要你指定一名或多名受法术魔法影响的目标。法术详述会说明其目标是生物、物件、或是其它事物。

与目标之间畅通无阻。 指定法术的目标时，其与施法者之间必须畅通无阻，因此目标不可以处于全身掩护之后。

以自身为目标， 如果法术的目标是由你指定的生物，则你也可以选择自身作为目标，除非法术描述中明确说明该目标必须是敌对生物或必须不是你自身。

效应区域， 一些法术，如 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThunderwav] 的效应会覆盖一片名为效应区域 Area of Effect（详见规则术语）的区域。该区域会用来决定法术的目标。法术详述中会详细说明其是否拥有效应范围，通常为以下五种形状区域之一：锥状、立方、柱状、光环、线状、球状。

不知自己被选中， 除非法术有可以观察到的效应，否则作为目标的生物不会知道自己已成为法术的目标。噼啪作响的闪电打中谁是大家都看得见的，但读心等较不显眼的效果一般都不会被发现，除非法术另有说明。

无效目标， 若你对某个不会被某道法术影响的生物或物件施展了那道法术，那么目标不会受到影响，但若这道法术需要使用法术位，则法术位仍会被消耗。

如果一道法术在豁免成功时对目标没有影响，那么无效目标会表现为如同进行并成功通过了此法术的豁免一样（即不会暴露其是一个无效目标）。但在其他情况下，你都会知晓无效目标没有受到此法术的影响。

豁免检定

很多法术会说明目标可以进行一次豁免来回避法术部分或全部的效应。相关法术的描述中会详细说明使用的什么属性来进行豁免，以及豁免成功和失败的后果。以下是如何计算你法术的DC：

法术豁免 = 8 ＋ 你的施法属性调整值 ＋ 你的熟练加值

攻击检定

某些法术会要求施法者进行攻击检定来决定法术是否有命中指定的目标。以下是如何计算你法术的攻击调整：

法术攻击调整 = 你的施法属性调整值 ＋ 你的熟练加值

法术效应混合

所有生效中的不同法术效应都会累加，而相同的法术就算进行多次施展则不会累加：多次施展相同的法术时，只有其中效应最强者，会在时效重叠期间生效——比如其中加值最高的那个。例如，假设两名牧师对同一目标施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]，则受术角色只得益一次而不会获得投两次附赠骰子的机会。但若是其中一道法术结束，则目标身上的法术效果仍会持续，直到第二个祝福术也结束。

辨识持续法术

你可以通过法术呈现的可见效果来辨识出一道正在持续中的、并非立即的法术。为此你需要执行研究动作并成功通过一次 [[/check 15 arc]] 检定。

key: entries->Welcome to Adventure->pages->Introduction from Jeremy Crawford->name
translation: 来自于 Jeremy Crawford 的介绍

key: entries->Welcome to Adventure->pages->Introduction from Jeremy Crawford->text
original:
This story began 50 years ago, and you're part of it. In the 1970s, Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson created a game of make-believe that fused rules with storytelling. There’d never been anything like it: a game in which each player made their own fantasy character and teamed up with their friends to go on quests. One person served as the narrator and referee—the Dungeon Master—and did everything they could to challenge and delight the other players. That game was, of course, the fi rst version of Dungeons & Dragons, and you’re now reading its latest version.

Over the decades, millions of people have played D&D, and scores of writers, game designers, and artists have made their mark on it through its various editions. When our team released the current edition in 2014, we were humbled by how many of you loved it. This revised ver- sion of it is a salute to all of you—those of you who’ve been playing D&D for years, those of you who’ve contributed to the game through your feedback, and those of you who are about to experience the joy of playing it for the first time.

As a teenager, I met both Gary and Dave. I even spent an entire day with Gary, and we did what all D&D fans do: share stories about our adventures in the D&D multiverse. I invite you to embark on such adventures anew. Share as much laughter as you can with your friends. Use only the rules that serve your fun, and always follow your group’s bliss. So many people have been enjoying the magic of D&D for half a century. Let’s keep it blazing for another 50 years!

Jeremy Crawford
translation:
这个故事始于 50 年前，而你可能也身处其中。1970 年代，Gary Gygax和Dave Arneson创造了一款将规则与叙事融为一体的虚构游戏。那时从未有过这样的游戏： 每个玩家创作一个属于自己的奇幻角色，再与朋友们合作一起完成任务。其中一人担任旁白和裁判，也就是地下城主（DM），他需要竭尽所能得给其他玩家提供挑战和乐趣。没错，那个游戏就是龙与地下城（D&D）的第一版，而你现在正在阅读的是它的最新版。

几十年来，数百万人玩过D&D，数十名作家、游戏设计师和艺术家通在数代的版本更迭中留下了自己的印记。当我们的团队在 2014 年发布的当前版广受好评时，我们也感到受宠若惊。这个修订版是向你们所有人致敬——那些玩了D&D多年的人们，那些向我们提出反馈为这个游戏添砖加瓦的人们，以及那些即将首次体验它的游玩乐趣的人们。

在我还年轻的时候，我遇到了Gary和Dave。我和Gary一起度过了一整天，我们做了所有D&D粉丝都会做的事情：分享我们在D&D多元宇宙中的冒险故事。现在，我将邀请你们再度开启这样的冒险，与朋友一同享受欢声笑语。拿起这些为创造乐趣而生的规则，让它伴随你的团队。半个世纪以来，许多人一直享受着D&D的魅力，让它的辉煌再闪耀50年吧！

——Jeremy Crawford

original:
Are you ready to embark on fantasy adventures with your friends? Dungeons & Dragons invites you to play imaginary adventurers who delve into dungeons and other perilous locations together, face fearsome foes such as dragons, and build friendships forged amid fantastical dangers.

Fueled by imagination and rules, D&D invites you to adopt a fantasy persona—a mighty Fighter, a cunning Rogue, a faithful Cleric, a magical Wizard, or something else—and then solve problems, fight monsters, and visit wondrous places.

There’s no winning and losing in D&D, at least not the way those terms are usually understood. Together you and friends create an exciting story of adventurers who confront perils. Sometimes an adventurer might come to a tragic end. Even so, the other adventurers can search for powerful magic to revive their fallen comrade, or the character’s player might create a new character to carry on. No matter what happens, if everyone has a good time and creates a memorable story, they all win.
translation:
你准备好和你的朋友一起开启奇妙的冒险了吗？ 龙与地下城诚邀您成为幻想世界的冒险者，你们将一起深入地下城和其他危险的地方，面对巨龙等可怕的敌人，在种种奇遇和危难之中与队友建立友谊。

在想象力和规则的推动下，D&D将引领你成为一名奇幻角色——一名强大的战士、一名狡猾的游荡者、一位忠诚的牧师、一位神奇的法师，或是别的——然后去解决麻烦、与怪物战斗，以及拜访各处奇观异景。

D&D不是一款分胜负的游戏，至少不是通常理解的那样。你将和朋友们一起创作一起惊心动魄的冒险故事。有时，冒险者可能会面临一个悲惨的结局。但即便如此，其他冒险者也可以寻找强大的魔法来复活他们倒下的同伴，或者干脆让失去角色的玩家重新创造一个新角色来继续下去。无论发生什么，只要每个人都能享受这段美好的时光，所有人都是赢家。

original:
Here’s what you need to play D&D with one or more friends (a typical group has five people):

Dungeon Master. One person takes on the role of the Dungeon Master (DM), the game’s lead storyteller and referee. The DM creates adventures for the players’ characters, who navigate its hazards and decide which paths to explore. The DM also narrates what they experience and plays the friends and foes they meet along the way. Even though the DM challenges the adventurers, the DM always strives to delight the whole group.

Players. Each player creates an adventurer who teams up with the other players’ adventurers. Working together, the group might explore a dark dungeon, a ruined city, a haunted castle, a lost temple, a lava-filled mountain, or another location described by the DM. The adventurers also solve puzzles, talk with other characters, battle fantastic monsters, and discover magic items and other treasure—all while supporting each other's fun.

You also need these resources, either in physical form or on DnDBeyond.com:

Player's Handbook. This book is your essential reference for the game's rules, and it guides you through making an adventurer of your own.

Dungeon Master's and Monster Manual. The first of these books guides the DM through creating and running adventures, and the second holds hundreds of monsters to fill those adventures.

Learn by Watching

A great way to learn the basics of D&D is to watch people play it. The Internet offers videos of D&D play that show off the tremendous range of possibilities the game offers. As you watch, pay attention to the ways that some players help make the game fun for everyone in their group. The only audience you need to entertain when you're playing D&D is yourself and your group.

Dice. You need a set of polyhedral dice (shown in chapter 1). You can find dice like these in game stores and from online retailers. Dice-rolling apps are also available.

Character Sheet. To keep track of important information about your character, you need a character sheet, which can be as simple as a piece of paper you write notes on or as feature-rich as a digital record.

The DM might also find these accessories useful:

DM Screen. Many DMs like to use a screen to shield their notes and dice rolls from players. It's bad manners to peek over the screen!

Miniatures and Battle Grid. Some DMs use a battle grid and miniatures to run combat encounters, since they help everyone visualize the action. A battle grid can be anything marked out in 1-inch squares, from disposable sheets of paper to poster maps. And miniatures range from simple tokens to detailed figurines. Online maps and miniatures are also available, including on DnDBeyond.com.
translation:
以下是你和一个或多个朋友（一个典型的团队由五个人组成）游玩D&D 需要准备的东西：

地下城主。一个人将扮演地下城主（DM），也就是游戏的主要讲述者和裁判。DM为玩家的角色创造冒险，让他们应对危险并决定探索的方向。DM还会叙述冒险者们的经历，并扮演他们一路上遇到的朋友和敌人。尽管DM有时会与冒险者对立，但让整个团队都感到高兴才是DM从始至终努力的目标。

玩家。 每个玩家创建一个冒险者，与其他玩家的冒险者组成小队。小队会一起探索黑暗地牢、城市废墟、闹鬼城堡、失落寺庙、熔岩火山， 或DM描述的其他地点。冒险者还将解开谜题、与其他角色交谈、与神奇的怪物战斗、寻找魔法物品和其他宝藏——所有这些要素都将互相支持、使乐趣不断攀升。

你同时还需要这些实物形式或DnDBeyond.com上的资源：

《玩家手册》。 这本书是你了解游戏规则的重要参考， 它会引导你为自己创建一名冒险者。

《地下城主指南》和《怪物图鉴》。 第一本书会指导DM如何创建和运行冒险，第二本书包含了数百个怪物可以填入冒险中的怪物。

从观察中学习。

学习 D&D基础知识的一个好方法就是观看人们玩这款游戏。互联网提供了一些 D&D的游玩视频，展示了这款游戏宏大的可能性。在你观看的时候，注意一下其中的玩家，是怎样做到令团队中的每个人都乐在其中。玩 D&D的时候最重要的就是让你和你的团队开心。

骰子。 你需要一组多面体骰子（如第 1 章所示），你可以在游戏店和网络零售商那里找到这样的骰子。掷骰子的APP也是可用的。

角色卡。为了跟踪有关角色的重要信息，你需要一张角色表，它可以像你随手拿来记笔记的纸这么简单，也可以是功能强大的电子记录。

DM可能还会用到这些东西：

城主帷幕。 许多DM喜欢使用帷幕来掩护他们的笔记和骰子不被玩家看到。窥探帷幕背后是很失礼的！

微缩模型和战斗地图。一些 DM 使用战斗网格地图和微缩模型来运行战斗遭遇战，这有助于让每个人直观地了解正发生的战斗。战斗网格地图可以是一次性纸张，或海报地图等任何形式，只要在上面能标记出1英寸的方格就行。微缩模型的规格从简单的指示物到栩栩如生的模型雕像都可以。你也可以在包括DnDBeyond.com这样的网站找到在线地图和微缩模型。

以下是你和一个或多个朋友（一个典型的团队由五个人组成）游玩D&D 需要准备的东西：

original:
Here's what you'll find in this book:

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbPlayingTheGam]{Chapter 1: Playing the Game}. The first chapter explains the fundamentals of the game, with examples to help you understand how to play.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar]{Chapter 2: Creating a Character}. Chapter 2 walks you through the steps of character creation.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCharacterClas]{Chapter 3: Character Classes}. Characters' capabilities are largely determined by class, such as Fighter or Wizard. Chapter 3 offers twelve classes to choose from, along with forty-eight subclasses.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCharacterOrig]{Chapter 4: Character Origins}. Background and species are key elements in defining a character's origin, which further shapes the character's abilities beyond the choice of class. Background and species options are presented in chapter 4.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000]{Chapter 5: Feats}. The feats in chapter 5 are special features that characters gain as part of their background and class.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbEquipment0000]{Chapter 6: Equipment}. Armor, weapons, and adventuring gear are found in chapter 6.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000]{Chapter 7: Spells}. This chapter contains descriptions of the spells that spellcasters can cast.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbAppendixATheM]{Appendix A: The Multiverse}. Here you'll find an overview of the magical multiverse where D&D adventures take place.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbAppendixBCrea]{Appendix B: Creature Stat Blocks}. This appendix brims with game information for creatures that certain characters can befriend or transform into.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbAppendixCRule]{Appendix C: Rules Glossary}. The game's main rules terminology is summarized in this appendix, making it an invaluable reference during play.

What's New in the 2024 Version?

This is the 2024 version of the fifth edition Player’s Handbook. If you’ve read the 2014 version, much of this book will feel familiar, since the fundamental rules of the game are the same. But the book contains many new or redesigned elements, and the versions of things in this book replace versions from older books. Here are highlights:

Streamlined Rules. The game’s rules have been streamlined and are now supported by a rules glossary.

Easier Character Creation. Using chapter 2, making a character is easier than ever before.

Enhanced Classes. In chapter 3, every class and subclass has been enhanced with new options. Reimagined Origins. Explored in chapter 4, a character’s origin is now defined by background and species, each of which has been redesigned.

Expanded Feats. In chapter 5, feats have been redesigned, with many feats added.

Upgraded Weapons, Tools, and Crafting. Mastery properties transform how weapon wielders use their weapons, and every character can enjoy new tool and crafting rules in chapter 6.

Dazzling Spells. Chapter 7 bursts with new spells and old ones that have been enhanced.

If you can’t find a rule, check the index. If a rule’s name has changed from what was printed in the 2014 Player’s Handbook, the index points you to the new name. For example, if you look up Inspiration in the index, it points you to the rules for Heroic Inspiration in the rules glossary.
translation:
以下是你会在这本书中找到的内容：

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbPlayingTheGam]{第1章 进行游戏}。 第一章解释了游戏的基本原理，并通过示例帮助你了解如何玩游戏。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar]{第2章 创建角色}。 第二章将带你完成角色创建的所有步骤。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCharacterClas]{第3章 角色职业}。 角色的能力很大程度上取决于职业，例如战士或法师。第三章提供了 12 种职业以及 48 个子职业。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCharacterOrig]{第4章 角色起源}。 背景和物种是定义角色起源的关键因素，这将在角色的职业选择之外，更深层次得塑造角色。第四章介绍了背景和物种选择。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000]{第5章 专长}。 第五章中的专长是角色作为背景和职业的一部分而获得的独特特性。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbEquipment0000]{第6章 装备}。 护甲、武器和冒险用品见第六章。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000]{第7章 法术}。 本章包含施法者可以施展的法术。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbAppendixATheM]{附录 A 多元宇宙}。 D&D 冒险发生的神奇的多元宇宙的概述见附录A。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbAppendixBCrea]{附录 B 生物资料}。 某些角色可以成为朋友或变身为生物的游戏信息见附录B。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbAppendixCRule]{附录 C 规则术语表}。 本附录总结了游戏的主要规则术语，其是游戏过程中的宝贵参考。

2024版本有什么新内容？

这是第五版《玩家手册》的2024版本。如果你读过2014版本，那这本书的大部分内容都会让人感到熟悉，因为游戏的基本规则是相同的。但这本书包含了许多新的或重新设计的元素，这些新版本的内容会取代了旧书中的。以下是本书的亮点：

简化的规则。 游戏规则得到简化，并且规则术语表支持你更好的理解它们。

更简单的角色创作。 使用第 2 章，创造角色会别以前更加容易。

职业增强。 在第 3 章中，每个职业和子职业都增加了新的选项。在第 4 章中探讨了角色的起源，现在由背景和物种定义，其中的每一个都经过了重新设计。

扩展专长。 在第 5 章重新设计了专长， 增加了许多新的选择。

升级的武器、工具和造物。 精通属性改变武器的使用方式，每个角色都可以享受第6章中新的工具和造物规则。

炫目法术。 第7章出现了新的法术和增强的旧法术。

当你找不到规则时，请查寻索引。如果规则的名称与2014版《玩家手册》中的名称不同，索引会为你指明新的名称。例如，如果你在索引中查找激励，它会在规则术语表中为你指出“英勇激励”的规则

original:
The worlds of D&D glimmer with magic, monsters, and spectacular adventure. Launching from a foundation of medieval fantasy, these worlds soar with possibilities beyond those of our reality.

D&D worlds exist in a multiverse and are connected to one another and to other planes of existence. Some of the worlds have been published as official D&D settings, including the Greyhawk, Forgotten Realms, Dragonlance, Spelljammer, Planescape, Dark Sun, Eberron, and Ravenloft settings. Alongside these worlds are thousands more, created by generations of D&D players for their own games. Amid the richness of the multiverse, you might create a world of your own.

The worlds of the multiverse share characteristics, but each world is set apart by its own history and geography. Your DM might set a campaign on one of these worlds or on a world of their own invention. Because there is so much variety among D&D worlds, check with your DM about the world of your upcoming adventures.
translation:
D&D 的世界闪烁着魔法、怪物和宏大的冒险。从中世纪幻想为基础，这些世界充满了超越我们现实的可能性。

D&D 世界存在于由一个又一个存在位面相互连接的多元宇宙中。一些世界已作为官方 D&D 设定发布，包括灰鹰、被遗忘的国度、龙枪、魔法船、异度风景、浩劫残阳、艾伯伦和鸦阁魔域系列。除了这些世界，还有数千个由几代D&D玩家为自己的游戏创造的世界。在多元宇宙的森罗万象中，你也可能会创造一个属于你自己的世界。

多元宇宙的世界有共同的特征，但每个世界都因其自己的历史和地理而与众不同。你的 DM 可能会在其中一个世界或是他们自己创造的世界中开启战役。由于 D&D 世界设定繁多，请向你的 DM 询问你即将前往的怎样的世界冒险。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.EceyH0R2456kRdtW caption=false classes="right three"]

Channel Rage into Violent Fury

Barbarians who walk the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrbBerserker0]{Path of the Berserker} direct their Rage primarily toward violence. Their path is one of untrammeled fury, and they thrill in the chaos of battle as they allow their Rage to seize and empower them.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.EceyH0R2456kRdtW caption=false classes="right three"]

以心中汹涌澎湃的怒火，步入狂暴。 Channel Rage into Violent Fury

踏上这条道路的踏上这条道路的野蛮人认为狂暴便是为了暴力。 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrbBerserker0]追求无拘的狂怒。因狂暴与怒火加持，他们在战斗的混沌快感中兴奋，舍生忘死的投入厮杀。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.Rk0QcsmW6g5c4XzL caption=false classes="three right"]

Walk in Community with the Animal World

Barbarians who follow the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrbWildHeart0]{Path of the Wild Heart} view themselves as kin to animals. These Barbarians learn magical means to communicate with animals, and their Rage heightens their connection to animals as it fills them with supernatural might.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.Rk0QcsmW6g5c4XzL caption=false classes="three right"]

漫步与动物王国的奇妙世界中。

跟随 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrbWildHeart0] 的野蛮人将自身视作动物们的家人。他们学习与动物交流的魔法手段，他们的狂暴赋予他们超自然的力量来增强与动物们的联系。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.Z2RPOWDkIBXRG0CQ caption=false classes="three right"]

Trace the Roots and Branches of the Multiverse

Barbarians who follow the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrbWorldTree0]{Path of the World Tree} connect with the cosmic tree Yggdrasil through their Rage. This tree grows among the Outer Planes, connecting them to each other and the Material Plane. These Barbarians draw on the tree’s magic for vitality and as a means of dimensional travel.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.Z2RPOWDkIBXRG0CQ caption=false classes="three right"]

探索多元宇宙的深邃根源与繁茂分支。

遵行 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrbWorldTree0]的野蛮人通过他们的狂暴与宇宙之树伊格德拉希尔（Yggdrasil）相连。这棵树生长在外层位面之间，连接着外层位面和物质位面。这些野蛮人借助世界之树的魔力获得生命力，并将其作为次元旅行的工具。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.rbUcTqEpuFZlIQiX caption=false classes="three right"]

Rage in Ecstatic Union with a God

Barbarians who walk the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrbZealot0000]{Path of the Zealot} receive boons from a god or pantheon. These Barbarians experience their Rage as an ecstatic episode of divine union that infuses them with power. They are often allies to the priests and other followers of their god or pantheon.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.rbUcTqEpuFZlIQiX caption=false classes="three right"]

沉浸在与神性合一的至高无上的狂喜中。

选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrbZealot0000] 的野蛮人可获得神或神系的恩赐。这些野蛮人将神人合一的狂想曲化为自身的狂暴，并因此获得力量。他们通常是其神灵或神系的祭司或是其信徒的盟友。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.SEwCFWmoe5wPqLWP caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrbBarbarian0]{Barbarians} are mighty warriors who are powered by primal forces of the multiverse that manifest as a Rage. More than a mere emotion—and not limited to anger—this Rage is an incarnation of a predator’s ferocity, a storm’s fury, and a sea’s turmoil.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.TA4xDoWO2cXuWKgX caption=false classes="right three"]

Some Barbarians personify their Rage as a fierce spirit or revered forebear. Others see it as a connection to the pain and anguish of the world, as an impersonal tangle of wild magic, or as an expression of their own deepest self. For every Barbarian, their Rage is a power that fuels not just battle prowess, but also uncanny reflexes and heightened senses.

Barbarians often serve as protectors and leaders in their communities. They charge headlong into danger so those under their protection don’t have to. Their courage in the face of danger makes Barbarians perfectly suited for adventure.

Becoming a Barbarian …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Barbarian Traits table.

  • Gain the Barbarian’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Barbarian Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Barbarian Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency with Martial weapons, and training with Shields.

  • Gain the Barbarian’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Barbarian Features table.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.SEwCFWmoe5wPqLWP caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrbBarbarian0]是强大的战士，他们由多元宇宙的原初力量所驱动，而这股力量便是 “狂暴”。野蛮人的狂暴不只是一种情感，而且是猎食者在绝境中激发的凶暴，是暴风雨般不顾一切的猛袭，也是大海中翻滚不息的波涛。

一些野蛮人将 “愤怒 ”具象化为凶蛮的灵体，或敬仰的先祖。另一些野蛮人却认为狂暴与世界的痛苦悲伤皆有联系，还有人认为狂暴是来自狂野魔法的无情纠缠，更有些人认为，狂暴是他们内心最深处，一种自我的表达。对所有野蛮人来说，而这种狂暴不止为每个野蛮人点燃其战斗狂热，更是他们灵活闪避，抵挡伤害和增强力量的源泉。

野蛮人通常扮演着社群的保护者和领导者。他们往往只身冲向危险，只为保护他人。面对危险的勇气使野蛮人非常适合冒险。

成为野蛮人...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得野蛮人核心特质表里的所有特质。
  • 获得野蛮人的 1 级特性（见野蛮人特性表）

作为兼职角色

  • 获得野蛮人核心特质表里的以下能力：生命骰、军用武器熟练和盾牌的护甲受训。

  • 获得野蛮人的1级特性（见野蛮人特性表）。

original: A Barbarian subclass is a specialization that grants you features at certain levels, as specified in the subclass. The next pages present the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBarbarian0000.JournalEntryPage.GvRPKO7EAbXB7TXM]{Path of the Berserker}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBarbarian0000.JournalEntryPage.DZftqg73PEeRWY4J]{Path of the Wild Heart}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBarbarian0000.JournalEntryPage.0NPflCZJaxFKhpXu]{Path of the World Tree}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBarbarian0000.JournalEntryPage.JZkVWnkmB47BwtLi]{Path of the Zealot} subclasses.
translation: 你选择获得一项野蛮人子职： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBarbarian0000.JournalEntryPage.GvRPKO7EAbXB7TXM], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBarbarian0000.JournalEntryPage.DZftqg73PEeRWY4J], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBarbarian0000.JournalEntryPage.0NPflCZJaxFKhpXu] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBarbarian0000.JournalEntryPage.JZkVWnkmB47BwtLi]。子职的内容见后文。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.UH2FRBZlS7owFx0R caption=false]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.mwPJyvhdaQxLSOkX caption=false classes="right two"]

Invoking magic through music, dance, and verse, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdBard000000]{Bards} are expert at inspiring others, soothing hurts, disheartening foes, and creating illusions. Bards believe the multiverse was spoken into existence and that remnants of its Words of Creation still resound and glimmer on every plane of existence. Bardic magic attempts to harness those words, which transcend any language.

Anything can inspire a new song or tale, so Bards are fascinated by almost everything. They become masters of many things, including performing music, working magic, and making jests.

A Bard’s life is spent traveling, gathering lore, telling stories, and living on the gratitude of audiences, much like any other entertainer. But Bards’ depth of knowledge and mastery of magic sets them apart.

Becoming a Bard …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Bard Traits table.

  • Gain the Bard’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Bard Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Bard Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency in one skill of your choice, proficiency with one Musical Instrument of your choice, and training with Light armor.

  • Gain the Bard’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Bard Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.UH2FRBZlS7owFx0R caption=false]

吟游诗人以音乐、舞蹈和诗歌唤起魔法，他们是鼓舞同伴、减轻伤痛、挫敌士气、创造幻象的专家。@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdBard000000]相信多元宇宙是因言语而化虚为实的，其创生圣言的残响依旧在各个存在位面之间回荡闪烁。诗人的魔法便是尝试利用那些超越任何语言的圣言。

任何事物都可能成为创作新歌曲或是新故事的灵感，因此吟游诗人几乎沉浸于一切事物。他们在各个领域都钻研至深，无论是音乐表演、研习魔法还是单纯地找乐子。

吟游诗人的生活与普通艺人没什么两样，充斥着旅行各地、收集传说、讲述故事然后靠着观众的打赏生活。但渊博的知识与对魔法的运用让吟游诗人与众不同。

成为一名吟游诗人…

作为1级角色

  • 获得吟游诗人核心特质表里的全部能力

  • 获得吟游诗人的 1 级特性（见吟游诗人特性表）

作为兼职角色

  • 获得吟游诗人核心特质表里的以下能力：生命骰，任选一项技能熟练，任选一项乐器熟练和轻甲的护甲受训。

  • 获得吟游诗人的 1 级特性（见吟游诗人特性表）。见第 2 章中的兼职规则以决定你的可用法术位。

original: A Bard subclass is a specialization that grants you features at certain levels, as specified in the subclass. The next pages present the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdDance00000]{College of Dance}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdGlamour000]{College of Glamour}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdLore000000]{College of Lore}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdValor00000]{College of Valor} subclasses.
translation: 你选择获得一项吟游诗人子职： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdDance00000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdGlamour000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdLore000000] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdValor00000] 。子职的内容见后文。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.RISGrIITP20DrPKj caption=false classes="three right"]

Move in Harmony with the Cosmos

Bards of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdDance00000]{College of Dance} know that the Words of Creation can’t be contained within speech or song; the words are uttered by the movements of celestial bodies and flow through the motions of the smallest creatures. These Bards practice a way of being in harmony with the whirling cosmos that emphasizes agility, speed, and grace.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.RISGrIITP20DrPKj caption=false classes="three right"]

舞步节律谐宇宙。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdDance00000]的吟游诗人认为，创世真言只用言语和歌声去表达是远远不够的；上到天体流转，下到动物蹦跳，这点点滴滴汇聚成的节奏才是创世真言的真正蕴含。这些吟游诗人勤学苦练旋转跳跃，只为和宇宙万物同频舞动，他们灵敏迅捷，舞姿优雅。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.8FZ9RIiHgj7UPntB caption=false classes="three right"]

Weave Beguiling Fey Magic

The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdGlamour000]{College of Glamour} traces its origins to the beguiling magic of the Feywild. Bards who study this magic weave threads of beauty and terror into their songs and stories, and the mightiest among them can cloak themselves in otherworldly majesty. Their performances stir up wistful longing for forgotten innocence, evoke unconscious memories of long-held fears, and tug at the emotions of even the most hard-hearted listeners.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.8FZ9RIiHgj7UPntB caption=false classes="three right"]

织魔作惑妖精术。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdGlamour000]的起源可以追溯到妖精荒野的魅惑魔法。学习这种魔法的吟游诗人擅长将出靓丽与怖人一同编织进他们的歌声和故事中，最强大的绚丽学院诗人可以将自己披上异界般的威严。他们的表演激起人们对过往纯真的思念，也会唤起人们对长久以来恐惧的无意识回忆，甚至会牵动最铁石心肠听众的情绪。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.rKcbuxF24YtAkfrB caption=false classes="three right"]

Plumb the Depths of Magical Knowledge

Bards of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdLore000000]{College of Lore} collect spells and secrets from diverse sources, such as scholarly tomes, mystical rites, and peasant tales. The college’s members gather in libraries and universities to share their lore with one another. They also meet at festivals or affairs of state, where they can expose corruption, unravel lies, and poke fun at self-important figures of authority.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.rKcbuxF24YtAkfrB caption=false classes="three right"]

博观觅识深钻法。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdLore000000]的吟游诗人从各种渠道——例如奥术著作、神秘仪式甚至市井故事——收集咒语和奥秘。他们聚集在图书馆或是学府之中，分享彼此之间获取的知识。他们也会出席国家事务或是参加节日活动，揭露腐败、拆穿谎言、对自以为是的权威者发起嘲笑。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.Ddbv0hTmdZCJ7N7u caption=false classes="three right"]

Sing the Deeds of Ancient Heroes

Bards of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdValor00000]{College of Valor} are daring storytellers whose tales preserve the memory of the great heroes of the past. These Bards sing the deeds of the mighty in vaulted halls or to crowds gathered around great bonfires. They travel to witness great events firsthand and to ensure that the memory of these events doesn’t pass away. With their songs, they inspire new generations to reach the same heights of accomplishment as the heroes of old.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.Ddbv0hTmdZCJ7N7u caption=false classes="three right"]

颂歌独唱旧英杰。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdValor00000]的吟游诗人是无畏的故事讲述者，他们的故事承载了过往伟大英雄的记忆。这些人儿在穹顶之下、篝火之侧、人群之间歌唱豪杰的功绩。他们四处旅行，用双眼记录史诗的发生，将传奇深埋心底并传承下去。他们激励新一代人勇攀高峰，达到与古老英雄同样的高度。

original:
Get Updated Items From Your Class, Subclass, Species, and Backgrounds

If one or more of the items/features granted to you by your class, subclass, species, or background were updated and you'd like to get the new version follow these steps:

  1. Back up your Actor by making a copy of it in the World by right clicking on the Actor in the sidebar and selecting "Duplicate".

  2. Review the list of updated items in this changelog for items that are granted by your Class, Subclass, Species, or Background to determine what needs to be replaced.

  3. Right click on the Class/Subclass/Species/Background that granted you the item and select "Edit".

  4. Go to the item's "Advancement" tab.

  5. Find the level that granted the item in the Advancement list.

  6. Delete the old item from your character sheet.

  7. In the Advancement list click on the cog icon in the top right of the level that granted it to re-run the advancement which will grant you the updated feature.

Replace Your Entire Class, Subclass, Species, or Background

If there were changes to your Class, Subclass, Species, or Background (not just the items/features that they grant you as you level up) that you would like to have you can follow these steps:

  1. Back up your Actor by making a copy of it in the World by right clicking on the Actor in the sidebar and selecting "Duplicate".

  2. Right click on the Class, Subclass, Species, or Background item and delete it.

  3. In the window that pops up leave the "Remove advancement changes" box checked and press the "Delete" button. This will remove all of the items/features granted to you by that item.

  4. Add your Class, Subclass, Species, or Background back to your sheet. You can then re-level your character. Refer to your back up Actor if you would like to ensure the choices are all the same.

Feature Enhancements

  • Improved styling and scoping rules for better appearance and less spillover styling.

  • Updated Epic Boon Feats and General Feats to support ASIs. [#973, #716]

  • Consolidated activities in the Battle Master maneuvers: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnvDisarmingA]{Disarming Attack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnvTripAttack]{Trip Attack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnvPushingAtt]{Pushing Attack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnvMenacingAt]{Menacing Attack}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnvGoadingAtt]{Goading Attack}. [#922]

  • Re-ordered the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSearingSmi]{Searing Smite} spell's activities. [#888]

  • Updated the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobConstricto]{Constrictor Snake} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobVenomousSn]{Venomous Snake} to use new artwork that became available in the 2024 Monster Manual. [#701]

  • Removed the second activity from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSlow000000]{Slow} spell as the inline roll in the description covers its use.

Bug Fixes

  • Added the correct art for @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbginGiantWasp0]{Giant Wasp}. [#910]

  • Added icons to the Active Effects in @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdNaturesWar]{Nature's Ward}. [#914]

  • Added Icon to @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrImprovedCr]{Improved Critical} activity; Corrected Typo in @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrTacticalMa]{Tactical Master}. [#915]

  • Updated "references.mjs" to point ability references to the correct compendium page in PHB. Also updated the compendium reference for &Reference[reactioncasting]. Note that the syntax for the reference to Conjuration magic is &Reference[spellSchool=con] (spellSchool=con) since "con" is also used to reference Constitution. [#920]

  • Updated @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftHealer00000]{Healer} Feat, clarifying the title of the Battle Medic activities, and edited activities so they will reroll a result of 1 in the background. [#932, #923]

  • Added missing condition Active Effect to Save vs. Push activity in @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThunderous]{Thunderous Smite} spell. With respect to the reporter's description in the issue, the spell describes two, mutually exclusive activities. One is a bonus action and the other is a free action that occurs after the bonus action. [#934]

  • The token subject image for the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbprgDruid00000]{Druid} example character to the correct path. [#937]

  • Set attack ability to DEX for @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbudsGhostlySpi]{Ghostly Spirit}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbudsPutridSpir]{Putrid Spirit}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbudsSkeletalSp]{Skeletal Spirit}. [#941]

  • Corrected @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplConjureFey]{Conjure Fey} summon activity Bonus Attack Damage formula. [#942]

  • Updated @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeSneakAttac]{Sneak Attack} feature to allow for Crit damage. [#944]

  • Added damage type to @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeatMetal0]{Heat Metal} where it was missing in the activities. [#949]

  • Updated "references.mjs" to point the reference for Push weapons mastery. Note that the syntax for the reference is &Reference[weaponMastery=push] (weaponMastery=push) since the word "push" is used in other references. [#953]

  • Updated modifier for @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdEmpoweredE]{Empowered Evocation} to use "@abilities.int.mod" rather than "@abilities.cha.mod". [#954]

  • Updated DC formula to "8 + @abilities.str.mod + @prof" in three instances (Barbarian, Bard, Monk) of Unarmed Strike's Grapple/Shove activity (corrects typo). [#955]

  • In advancement for the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.origins.Item.phbspForestGnome]{Forest Gnome} Species, Minor Illusion and Speak with Animals are split into separate advancement items so a casting limit ("@prof") is applied to the spell and not the cantrip. [#956]

  • Updated @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.origins.Item.phbbgAcolyte0000]{Acolyte} equipment and compendium links to reference PHB 2024 items (parchment, added holy symbol). [#959]

  • Updated @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftTavernBrawl]{Tavern Brawler} Feat damage roll formula to "1d4r1 + @abilities.str.mod". [#964]

  • Standardized identifier in Prepared Spells advancement items to "max-prepared" for all spellcasting classes and subclasses. [#965]

  • Updated the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnvRally00000]{Rally} maneuver feature's healing formula to "@scale.battle-master.superiority.die + (floor(@classes.fighter.levels/2))". [#968]

  • Updated @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftAlert000000]{Alert} feat to use the "flags.dnd5e.initiativeAlert" attribute. [#970]

  • Updated @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkHealingLig]{Healing Light} activity's Max Scaling formula to "clamp(@abilities.cha.mod, 1, @item.uses.value)". [#987]

  • Updated all documents to utilize the new "spell.mod.dc" and "spell.mod" values. [#967]

  • Added a link to Dancing Lights in the Elven Lineages table in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpeciesDescri.JournalEntryPage.h9oGyt2Wh9mp0xbg]{Elf} species description.

  • Added a link to @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.YSB1QtxZW2BI9f4Y#casting-without-slots]{Casting without Slots} to the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdRitualAdep]{Ritual Adept} feature.

  • Added Freedom of Movement to the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]{Bard spell list}.

  • Corrected typo in @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcWardingFla]{Warding Flare}'s description.

  • Added @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless} to the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcLifeDomain]{Life Domain} cleric's level 3 spells.

  • The Abjurer's @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdArcaneWard]{Arcane Ward} now uses the correct formulas.

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFeignDeath]{Feign Death}'s Active Effect no longer automatically applies when the spell is added to your sheet.

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbsplTinyDancin]{Dancing Light (Tiny)} now has the correct token scaling.

  • The Control Water and Ice Storm spells are now granted as "Always Prepared" for @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirsea0000]{Circle of the Sea} druids.

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.origins.Item.phbspDrow0000000]{Elf, Drow}'s Darkness trait is now correctly granted a free use per Long Rest.

  • The Starting Equipment for @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdDruid00000]{Druid}s, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrSorcerer00]{Sorcerer}s, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkWarlock000]{Warlock}s, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdWizard0000]{Wizard}s now includes their specific focus rather than any focus of their given type.

  • Added an Active Effect for @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBlur000000]{Blur} to make it easier to track.

  • Removed some redundant condition references which prevented the apply condition button from appearing.

  • Standardized the naming of activities across a variety of spells.

  • Implemented the details of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagAlchemistsF]{Alchemist's Fire}.

  5. Find the level that granted the item in the Advancement list.

  6. Delete the old item from your character sheet.

  7. In the Advancement list click on the cog icon in the top right of the level that granted it to re-run the advancement which will grant you the updated feature.

  4. Add your Class, Subclass, Species, or Background back to your sheet. You can then re-level your character. Refer to your back up Actor if you would like to ensure the choices are all the same.

  • Consolidated activities in the Battle Master maneuvers: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnvDisarmingA]{Disarming Attack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnvTripAttack]{Trip Attack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnvPushingAtt]{Pushing Attack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnvMenacingAt]{Menacing Attack}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnvGoadingAtt]{Goading Attack}.   • Added icons to the Active Effects in @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdNaturesWar]{Nature's Ward}. [#914]

  • Added Icon to @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrImprovedCr]{Improved Critical} activity; Corrected Typo in @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrTacticalMa]{Tactical Master}. [#915]

  • Updated "references.mjs" to point ability references to the correct compendium page in PHB. Also updated the compendium reference for &Reference[reactioncasting]. Note that the syntax for the reference to Conjuration magic is &Reference[spellSchool=con] (spellSchool=con) since "con" is also used to reference Constitution. [#920]

  • Updated @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftHealer00000]{Healer} Feat, clarifying the title of the Battle Medic activities, and edited activities so they will reroll a result of 1 in the background. [#932, #923]

  • Added missing condition Active Effect to Save vs. Push activity in @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThunderous]{Thunderous Smite} spell. With respect to the reporter's description in the issue, the spell describes two, mutually exclusive activities. One is a bonus action and the other is a free action that occurs after the bonus action. [#934]

  • The token subject image for the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbprgDruid00000]{Druid} example character to the correct path. [#937]

  • Set attack ability to DEX for @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbudsGhostlySpi]{Ghostly Spirit}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbudsPutridSpir]{Putrid Spirit}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbudsSkeletalSp]{Skeletal Spirit}. [#941]

  • Corrected @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplConjureFey]{Conjure Fey} summon activity Bonus Attack Damage formula. [#942]

  • Updated @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeSneakAttac]{Sneak Attack} feature to allow for Crit damage. [#944]

  • Added damage type to @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeatMetal0]{Heat Metal} where it was missing in the activities. [#949]

  • Updated "references.mjs" to point the reference for Push weapons mastery. Note that the syntax for the reference is &Reference[weaponMastery=push] (weaponMastery=push) since the word "push" is used in other references. [#953]

  • Updated modifier for @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdEmpoweredE]{Empowered Evocation} to use "@abilities.int.mod" rather than "@abilities.cha.mod". [#954]

  • Updated DC formula to "8 + @abilities.str.mod + @prof" in three instances (Barbarian, Bard, Monk) of Unarmed Strike's Grapple/Shove activity (corrects typo). [#955]

  • In advancement for the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.origins.Item.phbspForestGnome]{Forest Gnome} Species, Minor Illusion and Speak with Animals are split into separate advancement items so a casting limit ("@prof") is applied to the spell and not the cantrip. [#956]

  • Updated @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.origins.Item.phbbgAcolyte0000]{Acolyte} equipment and compendium links to reference PHB 2024 items (parchment, added holy symbol). [#959]

  • Updated @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftTavernBrawl]{Tavern Brawler} Feat damage roll formula to "1d4r1 + @abilities.str.mod". [#964]

  • Standardized identifier in Prepared Spells advancement items to "max-prepared" for all spellcasting classes and subclasses. [#965]

  • Updated the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnvRally00000]{Rally} maneuver feature's healing formula to "@scale.battle-master.superiority.die + (floor(@classes.fighter.levels/2))". [#968]

  • Updated @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftAlert000000]{Alert} feat to use the "flags.dnd5e.initiativeAlert" attribute. [#970]

  • Updated @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkHealingLig]{Healing Light} activity's Max Scaling formula to "clamp(@abilities.cha.mod, 1, @item.uses.value)". [#987]

  • Updated all documents to utilize the new "spell.mod.dc" and "spell.mod" values. [#967]

  • Added a link to Dancing Lights in the Elven Lineages table in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpeciesDescri.JournalEntryPage.h9oGyt2Wh9mp0xbg]{Elf} species description.

  • Added a link to @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.YSB1QtxZW2BI9f4Y#casting-without-slots]{Casting without Slots} to the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdRitualAdep]{Ritual Adept} feature.

  • Added Freedom of Movement to the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]{Bard spell list}.

  • Corrected typo in @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcWardingFla]{Warding Flare}'s description.

  • Added @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless} to the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcLifeDomain]{Life Domain} cleric's level 3 spells.

  • The Abjurer's @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdArcaneWard]{Arcane Ward} now uses the correct formulas.

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFeignDeath]{Feign Death}'s Active Effect no longer automatically applies when the spell is added to your sheet.

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbsplTinyDancin]{Dancing Light (Tiny)} now has the correct token scaling.

  • The Control Water and Ice Storm spells are now granted as "Always Prepared" for @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirsea0000]{Circle of the Sea} druids.

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.origins.Item.phbspDrow0000000]{Elf, Drow}'s Darkness trait is now correctly granted a free use per Long Rest.

  • The Starting Equipment for @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdDruid00000]{Druid}s, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrSorcerer00]{Sorcerer}s, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkWarlock000]{Warlock}s, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdWizard0000]{Wizard}s now includes their specific focus rather than any focus of their given type.

  • Added an Active Effect for @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBlur000000]{Blur} to make it easier to track.

  • Removed some redundant condition references which prevented the apply condition button from appearing.

  • Standardized the naming of activities across a variety of spells.

  • Implemented the details of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagAlchemistsF]{Alchemist's Fire}.

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.UuvlT8YBqkDMyj9R caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcCleric0000]{Clerics} draw power from the realms of the gods and harness it to work miracles. Blessed by a deity, a pantheon, or another immortal entity, a Cleric can reach out to the divine magic of the Outer Planes—where gods dwell—and channel it to bolster people and battle foes.

Because their power is a divine gift, Clerics typically associate themselves with temples dedicated to the deity or other immortal force that unlocked their magic. Harnessing divine magic doesn’t rely on specific training, yet Clerics might learn prayers and rites that help them draw on power from the Outer Planes.

Not every member of a temple or shrine is a Cleric. Some priests are called to a simple life of temple service, carrying out their devotion through prayer and rituals, not through magic. Many mortals claim to speak for the gods, but few can marshal the power of those gods the way a Cleric can.

Becoming a Cleric …

As a Level 1 Character

Gain all the traits in the Core Cleric Traits table.

  • Gain the Cleric’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Cleric Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Cleric Traits table: Hit Point Die and training with Light and Medium armor and Shields.

  • Gain the Cleric’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Cleric Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.UuvlT8YBqkDMyj9R caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcCleric0000] 从诸神的国度引动力量，用以展现奇迹。牧师蒙受一位神灵、一个神系、或是其它不朽存在的祝福——他们能从作为诸神栖身之所的众多外层位面中触及并引导神圣魔法，并驾驭此等伟力来祝福众生，击破强敌。

牧师的力量是神性的赠礼，所以他们经常来往于神殿——其中往往供奉着牧师所信仰的神明，或是给予其魔法能力的其它不朽存在。尽管使用神圣魔法并不需要特定的训练，但牧师仍然需要学习祷告与仪式，并用这些知识帮助自己引导外层位面的伟力。

圣殿或神庙的成员并不全是牧师。许多祭司在神殿中简朴地生活，通过祷告与仪式，而非魔法，来履行其奉献之职。很多凡人自称是宣讲神之话语的使者，而其中只有极少数人才能像真正的牧师一样，驾驭诸神的伟力。

成为牧师...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得牧师核心特质 表里的所有特质。

  • 获得牧师的1级特性（见牧师特性表）。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得牧师核心特质表中的生命值骰，轻甲、中甲和盾牌的护甲受训。

  • 获得牧师的1级特性（见牧师特性表）。 你的可用法术位见第二章中的兼职规则。

original:
A Cleric subclass is a specialization that grants you features at certain levels, as specified in the subclass. The next pages present the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCleric0000000.JournalEntryPage.aGYpgynZ3nkBCPaT]{Life Domain}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCleric0000000.JournalEntryPage.ChPhvB57FhM48ECO]{Light Domain}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCleric0000000.JournalEntryPage.G4wCgd6yslvpvKyN]{Trickery Domain}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCleric0000000.JournalEntryPage.r6CueEIytzMeRwwo]{War Domain} subclasses.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.iYYIz9iJWpRfYyFF caption=false]
translation: 你获得你所选的一个牧师子职： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCleric0000000.JournalEntryPage.aGYpgynZ3nkBCPaT], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCleric0000000.JournalEntryPage.ChPhvB57FhM48ECO], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCleric0000000.JournalEntryPage.G4wCgd6yslvpvKyN] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCleric0000000.JournalEntryPage.r6CueEIytzMeRwwo]。子职的内容见后文。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.ni0tD2OhmzJVVjxZ caption=false classes="three right"]

Soothe the Hurts of the World

The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcLifeDomain]{Life Domain} focuses on the positive energy that helps sustain all life in the multiverse. Clerics who tap into this domain are masters of healing, using that life force to cure many hurts.

Existence itself relies on the positive energy associated with this domain, so a Cleric of almost any religious tradition might choose it. This domain is particularly associated with agricultural deities, gods of healing or endurance, and gods of home and community. Religious orders of healing also seek the magic of this domain.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.ni0tD2OhmzJVVjxZ caption=false classes="three right"]

抚慰世界，疗愈伤痛。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcLifeDomain]专精于掌握支撑着多元宇宙众生灵的正能量。选择这个领域的牧师都是治愈大师，他们用这一生命原力治愈了无数的创伤。

生命的存在本身即是依赖着与此领域所关联的正能量，因此任何宗教系统的牧师都可能选择它。这个领域与农业之神、医疗与坚韧之神、以及家庭与社会之神的联系尤为紧密。那些致力于治愈众生的教团也十分重视这一领域的魔法。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.TJBxb5HP0PQZbYKY caption=false classes="three right"]

Bring Light to Banish Darkness

The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcLightDomai]{Light Domain} emphasizes the divine power to bring about blazing fire and revelation. Clerics who wield this power are enlightened souls infused with radiance and the power of their deities’ discerning vision, charged with chasing away lies and burning away darkness.

The Light Domain is associated with gods of truth, vigilance, beauty, insight, and renewal. Some of these gods are identified with the sun or as charioteers who guide the sun across the sky. Others are sentinels who pierce deception. Some are deities of beauty and artistry who teach that art is a vehicle for the soul’s improvement.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.TJBxb5HP0PQZbYKY caption=false classes="three right"]

携光而来，逐尽黑暗。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcLightDomai]的神圣力量着重于带来炽烈的火炎与启示。引动此等伟力的牧师们有着光辉的灵魂，其神明的力量助其窥破幻象，灼尽谎言，燃尽晦暗。

光明领域与司掌真理、警觉、美丽、洞察或革新的神祇所关联。此等神祇中有些被认为是太阳本身，或是驾着战车，指引着太阳划过天穹。另一些则是洞穿阴谋诡计的哨卫。还一些则是美与才艺之神，其教义述说着艺术即是扬升灵魂的道途。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.XofZMGocNyaKDoNg caption=false classes="three right"]

Make Mischief and Challenge Authority

The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcTrickeryDo]{Trickery Domain} offers magic of deception, illusion, and stealth. Clerics who wield this magic are a disruptive force in the world, puncturing pride, mocking tyrants, freeing captives, and flouting hollow traditions. They prefer subterfuge and pranks to direct confrontation.

Gods of trickery are mischief-makers and instigators who stand as a constant challenge to the accepted order among both gods and mortals. They embody the forces of change and social upheaval, and they’re patrons of thieves, scoundrels, gamblers, rebels, and liberators. Religious orders that operate in secret, especially those that seek to undermine oppressive governments or hierarchies, also draw on the power of the Trickery Domain.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.XofZMGocNyaKDoNg caption=false classes="three right"]

挑起闹剧，直面权威。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcTrickeryDo]提供了欺诈、幻觉与隐匿的魔法。驾驭此等魔法的牧师是世界的颠覆者，他们打击骄傲者的自尊，嘲弄暴君，窃盗富人，释放俘虏，并且蔑视毫无意义的传统。他们喜欢花言巧语、恶作剧、欺骗和盗窃要远远多于正面对抗。

诡术之神们均是恶作剧者，同时也是挑拨凡人或神明去颠覆现有秩序的煽动者。祂们是变革与动荡的具现，亦是小偷、恶棍、赌徒、叛乱者和解放者的庇护人。在暗中运作的教团，尤其是反抗高压的政府或社会体系的那些，也同样利用着来自诡术领域的力量。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.YG7dCEzrtTYtdhZz caption=false classes="three right"]

Inspire Valor and Smite Foes

War has many manifestations. It can make heroes of ordinary people. It can be desperate and horrific, with acts of cruelty and cowardice eclipsing instances of excellence and courage. Clerics who tap into the magic of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcWarDomain0]{War Domain} excel in battle, inspiring others to fight the good fight or offering acts of violence as prayers.

Gods of the War Domain watch over warriors and reward them for their great deeds. They include champions of honor and chivalry as well as gods of destruction and pillage. Other war gods take a more neutral stance, promoting war in all its manifestations and supporting warriors in any circumstance.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.YG7dCEzrtTYtdhZz caption=false classes="three right"]

激昂气概，击溃仇敌。

战争有多种表现形式。它令普通人成就英雄，也能带来绝望与恐惧；战争伴随着残忍与懦弱，却也交织着卓越与勇气。踏入 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcWarDomain0]之路的牧师们精于战斗，激励着他人在战斗中赢得荣耀——亦或是将暴行作为祭礼献上。

战争领域诸神守望着勇士们，并为他们伟大的事迹作出奖赏。战争之神的行列中有充满荣誉和骑士精神的勇者，亦也有破坏和掠夺的拥簇。其他战争神则采取更中立的立场，促进一切形式的战争，并在任何境遇下支持着武者们。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.psX0aM7vWPnjDy1f caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdDruid00000]{Druids} belong to ancient orders that call on the forces of nature. Harnessing the magic of animals, plants, and the four elements, Druids heal, transform into animals, and wield elemental destruction.

Revering nature above all, individual Druids gain their magic from nature, a nature deity, or both, and they typically unite with other Druids to perform rites that mark the passage of the seasons and other natural cycles.

Druids are concerned with the delicate ecological balance that sustains plant and animal life and with the need for people to live in harmony with nature. Druids often guard sacred sites or watch over regions of unspoiled nature, but when a significant danger arises, Druids take a more active role as adventurers who combat the threat.

Becoming a Druid …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Druid Traits table.

  • Gain the Druid’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Druid Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Druid Traits table: Hit Point Die and training with Light armor and Shields.

  • Gain the Druid’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Druid Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.psX0aM7vWPnjDy1f caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdDruid00000]的古老结社号令着自然的伟力。德鲁伊驱使着动物、植物和四大元素的魔法，能够治愈伤害，化身动物，和用元素降下毁灭。

德鲁伊从自然本身、自然神祇或两者共同处获得魔法，视自然高于一切。他们常会和其他德鲁伊一同举行仪式，这些仪式标志着四季的变换和其他自然的轮回。

德鲁伊关心微妙的生态平衡——它维系了大量动植物的生命与和自然和谐共处的人们的需求。德鲁伊通常守卫着圣地或看守着一片未经玷污的自然区域，但当重大的危险出现时，德鲁伊们则会扮演更积极的角色，加入冒险与之对抗。

成为一名德鲁伊…

作为1级角色

  • 获得德鲁伊核心特质表里的全部能力。

  • 获得德鲁伊的 1 级特性（见德鲁伊特性表）

作为兼职角色

  • 获得德鲁伊核心特质表里的以下能力：生命骰与轻甲和盾牌的护甲受训。

  • 获得德鲁伊的 1 级特性（见德鲁伊特性表）。见第 2 章中的兼职规则以决定你的可用法术位。

original:
A Druid subclass is a specialization that grants you features at certain levels, as specified in the subclass. The next pages present the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirland000]{Circle of the Land}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirmoon000]{Circle of the Moon}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirsea0000]{Circle of the Sea}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirstars00]{Circle of the Stars} subclasses.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.pBmHaKHliLvuPfUs caption=false]
translation: 你选择获得一项德鲁伊子职： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirland000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirmoon000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirsea0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirstars00] 。子职业的内容见后文。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.nZYRZlB2TkxCbQC5 caption=false classes="three right"]

Celebrate Connection to the Natural World

The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirland000]{Circle of the Land} comprises mystics and sages who safeguard ancient knowledge and rites. These Druids meet within sacred circles of trees or standing stones to whisper primal secrets in Druidic. The circle’s wisest members preside as the chief priests of their communities.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.nZYRZlB2TkxCbQC5 caption=false classes="three right"]

自然世界，颂之以系

创立@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirland000]的秘术师和智者们守护着远古的知识与各种传统仪式。结社的德鲁伊们聚集在神树之环下或石阵之中，他们用德鲁伊语低声交流，传递着原初的秘密。结社中最睿智的成员会担任其中的首席祭司。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.n1JJcOrHZkyaTHZ3 caption=false classes="three right"]

Adopt Animal Forms to Guard the Wilds

Druids of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirmoon000]{Circle of the Moon} draw on lunar magic to transform themselves. Their order gathers under the moon to share news and perform rituals.

Changeable as the moon, a Druid of this circle might prowl as a great cat one night, soar over the treetops as an eagle the next day, and then crash through undergrowth as a bear to drive off a trespassing monster. The wild is in the Druid’s blood.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.n1JJcOrHZkyaTHZ3 caption=false classes="three right"]

荒野卫士，身化兽躯

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirmoon000]的德鲁伊借月亮之力变换形体。他们聚集在满月之下分享情报，交换警示并执行仪式。

月亮结社的德鲁伊就如月亮那般善变，他们会作为野猫徘徊一晚，第二天又成为一只盘旋在树顶老鹰，再以熊的形态赶走领地中的入侵者。其德鲁伊之血充满野性。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.mHpIstCE24qkzKqy caption=false classes="three right"]

Become One with Tides and Storms

Druids of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirsea0000]{Circle of the Sea} draw on the tempestuous forces of oceans and storms. Some view themselves as embodiments of nature’s wrath, seeking vengeance against those who despoil nature. Others seek mystical unity with nature by attuning themselves to the ebb and flow of the tides, following the rush of currents and waves and listening to the inscrutable whispers and roars of the winds.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.mHpIstCE24qkzKqy caption=false classes="three right"]

海潮风暴，一体同心。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirsea0000] 的德鲁伊们驱使着世界上海洋和风暴中狂野的自然之力。其中一些德鲁伊将自己视作自然怒火的化身，对那些掠夺自然世界的人们施以报复。而另一些德鲁伊则顺应潮汐的涨落，跟随洋流和波浪的激荡，聆听狂风的低语和怒号，从中寻求和自然的灵性统一。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.lOyX9K8LEAd5IswG caption=false classes="three right"]

Harness Secrets Hidden in Constellations

The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirstars00]{Circle of the Stars} has tracked heavenly patterns since time immemorial, discovering secrets hidden amid the constellations. By understanding these secrets, the Druids of this circle seek to harness the powers of the cosmos.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.lOyX9K8LEAd5IswG caption=false classes="three right"]

群星隐秘，求索驭力。

在无法追忆的过去，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdCirstars00]的德鲁伊们便开始记录天穹中的图案，探索星座之间隐藏的秘密。通过理解这些秘密，这个结社的德鲁伊探索着如何驾驭宇宙的伟力。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.esJhJ8UP0U2EJu74 caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrFighter000]{Fighters} rule many battlefields. Questing knights, royal champions, elite soldiers, and hardened mercenaries—as Fighters, they all share an unparalleled prowess with weapons and armor. And they are well acquainted with death, both meting it out and defying it.

Fighters master various weapon techniques, and a well-equipped Fighter always has the right tool at hand for any combat situation. Likewise, a Fighter is adept with every form of armor. Beyond that basic degree of familiarity, each Fighter specializes in certain styles of combat. Some concentrate on archery, some on fighting with two weapons at once, and some on augmenting their martial skills with magic. This combination of broad ability and extensive specialization makes Fighters superior combatants.

Becoming a Fighter …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Fighter Traits table.

  • Gain the Fighter’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Fighter Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Fighter Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency with Martial weapons, and training with Light and Medium armor and Shields.

  • Gain the Fighter’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Fighter Features table.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.esJhJ8UP0U2EJu74 caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrFighter000] 是诸多战场的主宰者。

无论是探险骑士、皇家勇士、亦或者是那些百战精兵、历练老成的佣兵，他 们都是战士的一员。他们在盔甲与武器的运用上拥有旁人无与伦比的造诣。战士们对死亡洞若观火，他们既不害怕面对死亡，更不畏惧与死亡抗争。

战士精通百般武艺，一个披坚执锐的战士总是能在各种战斗情况下挥舞最适合的武器。同样，战士也熟稔各式各样的甲胄。在那些最基本的东西之外，每个战士在战斗上也都有着自己的一技之长。一些人熟习射技，一些人会在战斗中同时挥舞两把武器，还有一些则会以魔法来增幅自身的武艺。这种泛用才能与特化领域的相互结合，让战士成为了更优异的作战人员。

成为一名战士…

作为1级角色

  • 获得战士核心特质表里的全部能力。

  • 获得战士的 1 级特性（见战士特性表 ）

作为兼职角色

  • 获得战士核心特质表里的以下能力：生命骰、军用武器熟练和轻甲、中甲及盾牌的护甲受训。

  • 获得战士的 1 级特性（见战士特性表 ）。

original: A Fighter subclass is a specialization that grants you features at certain levels, as specified in the subclass. The next pages present the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrBattleMast]{Battle Master}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrChampion00]{Champion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrEldritchKn]{Eldritch Knight}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrPsiWarrior]{Psi Warrior} subclasses. @Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.Dxmovf4md47R3EjZ]
translation: 你选择获得一项战士子职：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrBattleMast], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrChampion00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrEldritchKn] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrPsiWarrior]。子职业的内容见后文。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.Lmsac07AO6ZzvEcG caption=false classes="three right"]

Master Sophisticated Battle Maneuvers

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrBattleMast]{Battle Masters} are students of the art of battle, learning martial techniques passed down through generations. The most accomplished Battle Masters are well-rounded figures who combine their carefully honed combat skills with academic study in the fields of history, theory, and the arts.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.Lmsac07AO6ZzvEcG caption=false classes="three right"]

战技百般昭武艺。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrBattleMast]是研习战斗技艺的学者，他们勤学代代相传的武术。那些最负盛名的战斗大师将苦心练就的武功与史学、艺术与理论相互结合，由此，他们往往兼备文才武略。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.qayHNwOyTmTv3cXj caption=false classes="three right"]

Pursue Physical Excellence in Combat

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrChampion00]{Champion} focuses on the development of martial prowess in a relentless pursuit of victory. Champions combine rigorous training with physical excellence to deal devastating blows, withstand peril, and garner glory. Whether in athletic contests or bloody battle, Champions strive for the crown of the victor.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.qayHNwOyTmTv3cXj caption=false classes="three right"]

勇冠三军彰英豪。

在对胜利的不懈追求中， @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrChampion00] 专注于发展自身的武勇。他们通过严酷的训练锻冶出卓绝的肉体以直面打击，跨越险境，寻觅荣誉。无论是在角斗场之中还是血染的疆场上，勇士都只为夺得胜利之桂冠而奋战。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.iW2cLi93r3AuYxUi caption=false classes="three right"]

Support Combat Skills with Arcane Magic

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrEldritchKn]{Eldritch Knights} combine the martial mastery common to all Fighters with a careful study of magic. Their spells both complement and extend their combat skills, providing additional protection to shore up their armor and also allowing them to engage many foes at once with explosive magic.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.iW2cLi93r3AuYxUi caption=false classes="three right"]

奥法遍身附剑戟。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrEldritchKn] 将所有战士共通的高超武技与对魔法的精妙研究融合贯通。法术补足并拓展了他们的武技，为甲胄提供额外的保护 ，并使他们能够使用爆发性的魔法同时与多个敌人鏖战。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.1A9tH1YFWh3bj4Ps caption=false classes="three right"]

Augment Physical Might with Psionic Power
