@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrPsiWarrior]{Psi Warriors} awaken the power of their minds to augment their physical might. They harness this psionic power to infuse their weapon strikes, lash out with telekinetic energy, and create barriers of mental force.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.1A9tH1YFWh3bj4Ps caption=false classes="three right"]

灵能庇体显神威。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbftrPsiWarrior]唤醒他们心灵中的力量以增强自身的体魄，他们将这种被称为灵能的力量注入于刀兵之中，用念动力鞭笞他们的敌人，并以精神力铸造无形壁垒抵御攻击。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.fYVTGxSWBTBc602Y]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkMonk000000]{Monks} use rigorous combat training and mental discipline to align themselves with the multiverse and focus their internal reservoirs of power. Different Monks conceptualize this power in various ways: as breath, energy, life force, essence, or self, for example. Whether channeled as a striking display of martial prowess or as a subtler manifestation of defense and speed, this power infuses all that a Monk does.

Monks focus their internal power to create extraordinary, even supernatural, effects. They channel uncanny speed and strength into their attacks, with or without the use of weapons. In a Monk’s hands, even the most basic weapons can become sophisticated implements of combat mastery.

Many Monks find that a structured life of ascetic withdrawal helps them cultivate the physical and mental focus they need to harness their power. Other Monks believe that immersing themselves in the vibrant confusion of life helps to fuel their determination and discipline.

Monks generally view adventures as tests of their physical and mental development. They are driven by a desire to accomplish a greater mission than merely slaying monsters and plundering treasure; they strive to turn themselves into living weapons.

Becoming a Monk …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Monk Traits table.

  • Gain the Monk’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Monk Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the Hit Point Die trait from the Core Monk Traits table.

  • Gain the Monk’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Monk Features table.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.fYVTGxSWBTBc602Y]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkMonk000000]用严格的战斗训练与精神修行究天人之际，通己身之变。不同的武僧会给这股力量赋予不同的概念，或吐纳，或内功，或阳气，或灵明，或真我。无论是打出惊世神功，或是显于灵犀一动，这种力量都是武僧威能的来源。

武僧们积蓄和引导这种力量，创造出诸般非凡乃至超自然的效应。无论是用徒手或兵刃，他们的力量和速度都是同等惊世骇俗。凭着这股奇能，无论什么器物到了他们手中，都能化作取胜的法宝。他们的浑身一击更是能直接震慑对手。

许多武僧发现，远离世俗的苦行生活有助于他们肉体与精神的修行。也同样有许多武僧认为入世的生活更有助于修炼出心境与定力

因此武僧们通常会把冒险看作是一种对身心的淬炼。他们所求的是比杀死怪物与获得宝藏更崇高的道；他们的身体就是克敌制胜的最上妙法。

成为武僧…

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得武僧核心特质表中的所有特质。

  • 获得武僧的 1 级特性，(见武僧特性表) 。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得武僧核心特质表中的生命值骰特质。

  • 获得武僧的 1 级特性，(见武僧特性表)。

original: A Monk subclass is a specialization that grants you features at certain levels, as specified in the subclass. The next pages present the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkMercyWarri]{Warrior of Mercy}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkShadowWarr]{Warrior of Shadow}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkElementsWa]{Warrior of the Elements}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkOpenHandWa]{Warrior of the Open Hand} subclasses.
translation: 你获得一个武僧子职业，从以下选择一项：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkMercyWarri], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkShadowWarr], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkElementsWa] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkOpenHandWa]。子职业的内容见后文。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.LbGptG9eEuu2nNwL caption=false classes="three right"]

Manipulate Forces of Life and Death

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkMercyWarri]{Warriors of Mercy} manipulate the life force of others. These Monks are wandering physicians, but they bring a swift end to their enemies. They often wear masks, presenting themselves as faceless bringers of life and death.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.LbGptG9eEuu2nNwL caption=false classes="three right"]

掌执命流。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkMercyWarri]操弄着他人的命流之力。这些武僧既是云游的医者，但也能给敌人带去迅疾的死亡。他们总戴着面具，以无脸的生死使者之形象示人。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.yIwAis0MvTMsjCe5 caption=false classes="three right"]

Harness Shadow Power for Stealth and Subterfuge

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkShadowWarr]{Warriors of Shadow} practice stealth and subterfuge, harnessing the power of the Shadowfell. They are at home in darkness, able to draw gloom around themselves to hide, leap from shadow to shadow, and take on a wraithlike form.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.yIwAis0MvTMsjCe5 caption=false classes="three right"]

暗影藏形

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkShadowWarr]习练隐匿与遁术，引导，积蓄和驾驭来自堕影冥界的力量。他们居于黑暗，藏于薄暮，遁于幽影，出手亦犹如幽影一般凶险。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.NLBWCSUy2sIvCtzJ caption=false classes="three right"]

Wield Strikes and Bursts of Elemental Power

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkElementsWa]{Warriors of the Elements} tap into the power of the Elemental Planes. Harnessing their supernatural focus, these Monks momentarily tame the energy of the Elemental Chaos to empower themselves in and out of battle.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.NLBWCSUy2sIvCtzJ caption=false classes="three right"]

身起四象

武僧们修习武术以参出元素位面的力量，此谓之曰四象派。@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkElementsWa]会将各种元素混杂融合，博采众长，以便在需要的时候使出需要的力量。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.jmcZttoCPWV91sB1 caption=false classes="three right"]

Master Unarmed Combat Techniques

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkOpenHandWa]{Warriors of the Open Hand} are masters of unarmed combat. They learn techniques to push and trip their opponents and manipulate their own energy to protect themselves from harm.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.jmcZttoCPWV91sB1 caption=false classes="three right"]

散打随心。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbmnkOpenHandWa]是徒手战斗的大师，他们学习了推离和绊摔的技艺妨敌，并用内力保护自己免受伤害。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.iPWoJTCp4yt4DQRw]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.TC9abWoNH0c8izAp caption=false classes="right three"]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbprgPaladin000]{Paladins} are united by their oaths to stand against the forces of annihilation and corruption. Whether sworn before a god’s altar, in a sacred glade before nature spirits, or in a moment of desperation and grief with the dead as the only witnesses, a Paladin’s oath is a powerful bond. It is a source of power that turns a devout warrior into a blessed champion.

Paladins train to learn the skills of combat, mastering a variety of weapons and armor. Even so, their martial skills are secondary to the magical power they wield: power to heal the injured, smite their foes, and protect the helpless and those who fight at their side.

Almost by definition, the life of a Paladin is an adventuring life, for every Paladin lives on the front lines of the cosmic struggle against annihilation. Fighters are rare enough among the ranks of a world’s armies, but even fewer people can claim the calling of a Paladin. When they do receive the call, these blessed folk turn from their former occupations and take up arms and magic.

Becoming a Paladin …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Paladin Traits table.

  • Gain the Paladin’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Paladin Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Paladin Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency with Martial weapons, and training with Light and Medium armor and Shields.

  • Gain the Paladin’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Paladin Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.iPWoJTCp4yt4DQRw]

身怀不同过往与使命的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbprgPaladin000] 们在各自誓言的驱使下团结一致对抗邪恶势力。他们也许是在神坛前由祭司见证宣誓，或在林中圣地向自然精魄许下承诺，又或是面临绝望与灾难却只有死者见证下立约，所有这些圣武士誓言都是极强的契约。而正是誓言的伟力才让一名虔诚的战士化作身负祝福的勇者。

圣武士宣誓维护公理与正义，宣誓与世间所有的善良一起对抗不断侵蚀而来的黑暗，宣誓狩猎四处潜伏的所有邪恶。圣武士们专注于公义事业的不同方面，而其力量均来自于各自立下的誓言契约。

圣武士的存在本身即决定了其为冒险而生，圣武士们在一线对抗毁灭的身影遍布多元宇宙。如果说军伍之中能够找到的战士寥寥可数，那么能够受到感召的圣武士更是凤毛麟角。而这些勇士们受到感召时，都会义无反顾地放弃所拥有的身份地位，义无反顾的加入对抗邪恶的战斗中。

成为圣武士…

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得圣武士核心特质表里的全部能力

  • 获得圣武士的 1 级特性（见圣武士特性表）

作为兼职角色

  • 获得圣武士核心特质表里的以下能力：生命骰，军用武器熟练，以及轻甲，中甲和盾牌的护甲受训。

  • 获得圣武士的 1 级特性（见圣武士特性表）。见第 2 章的兼职规则以决定你的可用法术位。

original: A Paladin subclass is a specialization that grants you features at certain levels, as specified in the subclass. The next pages present the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfDevo]{Oath of Devotion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfGlor]{Oath of Glory}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfTheA]{Oath of the Ancients}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfVeng]{Oath of Vengeance} subclasses.
translation: 你选择获得一项圣武士子职业，从以下选择一项： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfDevo] @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfGlor], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfTheA], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfVeng]。子职业的内容见后文。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.3DHjTK7qlPg4HNYU caption=false classes="three right"]

Uphold the Ideals of Justice and Order

The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfDevo]{Oath of Devotion} binds Paladins to the ideals of justice and order. These Paladins meet the archetype of the knight in shining armor. They hold themselves to the highest standards of conduct, and some—for better or worse—hold the rest of the world to the same standards.

Many who swear this oath are devoted to gods of law and good and use their gods’ tenets as the measure of personal devotion. Others hold angels as their ideals and incorporate images of angelic wings into their helmets or coats of arms.

These paladins share the following tenets:

  • Let your word be your promise.

  • Protect the weak and never fear to act.

  • Let your honorable deeds be an example.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.3DHjTK7qlPg4HNYU caption=false classes="three right"]

当仁不让知行正。

圣武士立下@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfDevo]，只为维护正义和秩序。他们是身披闪亮的盔甲的正派骑士形象代表，躬行着公正的教条，追寻崇高的目标。
追随该誓言的许多圣武士都献身于守序和善良的神，并将其的信条视作奉献的标准。他们将善良阵营的完美侍从天使视作其典范，并在头盔或盾徽上饰以天使羽翼的形象。
立下此誓言的圣武士都赞成以下信条：

  • 实事求是，言出必行。
  • 锄强扶弱，临危不惧。
  • 荣誉为典，以身作则。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.NSQCO8WeewZNRNvb caption=false classes="three right"]

Strive for the Heights of Heroism

Paladins who take the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfGlor]{Oath of Glory} believe they and their companions are destined to achieve glory through deeds of heroism. They train diligently and encourage their companions, so they’re all ready when destiny calls.

These paladins share the following tenets:

  • Endeavor to be known by your deeds.

  • Face hardships with courage.

  • Inspire others to strive for glory.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.NSQCO8WeewZNRNvb caption=false classes="three right"]

砥身励行蜚声英

对@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfGlor]{荣耀}宣誓的圣武士坚信他们将与同伴一起达成英勇的伟业，并命中注定以此取得荣耀。他们将刻苦训练，砥砺前行，从而确保当命运决定的时刻到来之际，他们都已有所准备。
立下此誓言的圣武士都赞成以下信条：

  • 力争上游，行胜于言。
  • 无惧挑战，勇往直前。
  • 振奋人心，力争荣耀。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.MOn6qZ2dV0VBHusB caption=false classes="three right"]

Preserve Life and Light in the World

The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfTheA]{Oath of the Ancients} is as old as the first elves. Paladins who swear this oath cherish the light; they love the beautiful and life-giving things of the world more than any principles of honor, courage, and justice. They often adorn their armor and clothing with images of growing things—leaves, antlers, or flowers—to reflect their commitment to preserving life and light.

These paladins share the following tenets:

  • Kindle the light of hope.

  • Shelter life.

  • Delight in art and laughter.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.MOn6qZ2dV0VBHusB caption=false classes="three right"]

护生驱暗济世界

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfTheA]存在的时间与精灵一族的历史那般古老。立下此誓言的圣武士珍视光明，比起荣耀、勇气和正义的准则，他们更热爱美与生命。他们在盔甲和服饰上饰以树叶、鹿角、花朵等等生机勃勃的纹样，以象征自己立下承诺保护世上的生命与光明。
立下此誓言的圣武士都赞成以下信条：

  • 救死扶伤，点亮希望。
  • 守护光明，庇护生命。
  • 乐人之乐，善济天下。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.8J2SuRksDxJJcFiv caption=false classes="three right"]

Punish Evildoers at Any Cost

The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfVeng]{Oath of Vengeance} is a solemn commitment to punish those who have committed grievously evil acts. When evil armies slaughter helpless villagers, when a tyrant defies the will of the gods, when a thieves’ guild grows too violent, when a dragon rampages through the countryside—at times like these, paladins arise and swear an Oath of Vengeance to set right what has gone wrong.

These paladins share the following tenets:

  • Show the wicked no mercy.

  • Fight injustice and its causes.

  • Aid those harmed by injustice.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.8J2SuRksDxJJcFiv caption=false classes="three right"]

铁面无情伏妖魔

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbpdnOathOfVeng]，是立誓惩戒那些严重罪行的庄严承诺。当邪恶势力屠杀无助居民，当暴君背离神的意志，当某个盗贼行会过于强横霸道，当恐怖巨龙横行乡野——每当这种时刻，复仇之誓的圣武士就会出现来拨乱反正。
立下此誓言的圣武士都赞成以下信条：

  • 对恶徒，绝无怜悯。
  • 抗不义，追究到底。
  • 遇不平，拔刀相助。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.7qN4IGLvwpc7j7KP caption=false]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.r9NYYGWNoSxEYTlU caption=false classes="right two"]

Far from bustling cities, amid the trees of trackless forests and across wide plains, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrRanger0000]{Rangers} keep their unending watch in the wilderness. Rangers learn to track their quarry as a predator does, moving stealthily through the wilds and hiding themselves in brush and rubble.

Thanks to their connection with nature, Rangers can also cast spells that harness primal powers of the wilderness. A Ranger’s talents and magic are honed with deadly focus to protect the world from the ravages of monsters and tyrants.

Becoming a Ranger …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Ranger Traits table.

  • Gain the Ranger’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Ranger Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Ranger Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency with Martial weapons, proficiency in one skill of your choice from the Ranger’s skill list, and training with Light and Medium armor and Shields.

  • Gain the Ranger’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Ranger Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.7qN4IGLvwpc7j7KP caption=false]

在远离城市喧嚣的荒野之中，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrRanger0000]穿行于人迹罕至的密林、广袤无垠的平原，进行着他们永不结束的守望。游侠们如猎食猛兽般追迹猎物，匿踪于灌木与瓦砾之中，悄步于在荒野之上。

游侠与自然联系密切，他们施展的魔法驾驭着荒野之中的原初伟力。游侠磨炼天赋与魔法，只为保护这个世界免受怪物与暴君的肆虐。

成为一名游侠…

作为1级角色

  • 获得游侠核心特质表里的所有特质。

  • 获得游侠的 1 级特性（见游侠特性表）。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得游侠核心特质表里的以下能力：生命值骰、军用武器熟练、 从游侠技能熟练表中选择一个技能熟练、轻中甲与盾牌的护甲受训。

  • 获得游侠的 1 级特性（见游侠特性表）。你的可用法术位见第二章中的兼职规则。

original: A Ranger subclass is a specialization that grants you features at certain levels, as specified in the subclass. The next pages present the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrBeastMaste]{Beast Master}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrFeyWander0]{Fey Wanderer}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrGloomStalk]{Gloom Stalker}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrHunter0000]{Hunter} subclasses.
translation: 你选择获得一项游侠子职： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrBeastMaste], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrFeyWander0], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrGloomStalk] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrHunter0000]。子职业的内容见后文。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.fzHuYQM4SG6qynLV caption=false classes="three right"]

Bond with a Primal Beast

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrBeastMaste]{Beast Master} forms a mystical bond with a special animal, drawing on primal magic and a deep connection to the natural world.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.fzHuYQM4SG6qynLVcaption=false classes="three right"]

与原始野兽结缘。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrBeastMaste]，他们同这片大地有着深刻的共鸣，挥舞着原初魔法与超自然野兽形成了神秘的联系。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.ckJhsBIlf7Qxo19z caption=false classes="three right"]

Wield Fey Mirth and Fury

A fey mystique surrounds you, thanks to the boon of an archfey or a location in the Feywild that transformed you. However you gained fey magic, you are now a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrFeyWander0]{Fey Wanderer}. Your joyful laughter brightens the hearts of the downtrodden, and your martial prowess strikes terror in your foes, for great is the mirth of the fey and dreadful is their fury.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.ckJhsBIlf7Qxo19zcaption=false classes="three right"]

驾驭妖精的哀与乐。

或来自一位至高妖精的恩惠，或是在妖精荒野中的一次奇遇，你的身侧因那次奇遇而有妖精的魔力缠绕。无论你是怎么得到了来自妖精的魔法的，你现在是一名@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrFeyWander0]。你轻快的笑声为受压迫者们带来欣喜的希望，你英勇的技艺直击你敌人的恐惧，你所就的伟绩乃是妖精的喜悦，你散布的恐惧乃是妖精的愤怒。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.6lH0bBjC8Fxg9rkI caption=false classes="three right"]

Draw on Shadow Magic to Fight Your Foes

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrGloomStalk]{Gloom Stalkers} are at home in the darkest places, wielding magic drawn from the Shadowfell to combat enemies that lurk in darkness.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.6lH0bBjC8Fxg9rkIcaption=false classes="three right"]

利用阴影魔法制敌。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrGloomStalk] 们以至暗之地为家，驾驭着来自堕影冥界的魔法，与潜伏在黑暗中的敌人作战。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.eDSDWaZqyZqNAGxd caption=false classes="three right"]

Protect Nature and People from Destruction

You stalk prey in the wilds and elsewhere, using your abilities as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrHunter0000]{Hunter} to protect nature and people everywhere from forces that would destroy them.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.eDSDWaZqyZqNAGxd caption=false classes="three right"]

保护自然与人民免于毁灭。

你追逐猎物直到天涯海角，运用你的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrHunter0000] 的本领去保护自然与人民，使其不受灾祸的毁灭。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.EJGPmvmIPA4IT60s caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeRogue00000]{Rogues} rely on cunning, stealth, and their foes’ vulnerabilities to get the upper hand in any situation. They have a knack for finding the solution to just about any problem. A few even learn magical tricks to supplement their other abilities. Many Rogues focus on stealth and deception, while others refine skills that help them in a dungeon environment, such as climbing, finding and disarming traps, and opening locks.

In combat, Rogues prioritize subtle strikes over brute strength. They would rather make one precise strike than wear an opponent down with a barrage of blows.

Some Rogues began their careers as criminals, while others used their cunning to fight crime. Whatever a Rogue’s relation to the law, no common criminal or officer of the law can match the subtle brilliance of the greatest Rogues.

Becoming a Rogue …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Rogue Traits table.

  • Gain the Rogue’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Rogue Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Rogue Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency in one skill of your choice from the Rogue’s skill list, proficiency with Thieves’ Tools, and training with Light armor.

  • Gain the Rogue’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Rogue Features table.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.A8wujCme7opVrxUE caption=false]
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.EJGPmvmIPA4IT60s caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeRogue00000]依靠潜行与诡计来精准打击敌人的弱点，并在任何情况下都能取得上风。他们面对任何问题都能轻松找到应对措施。甚至一些游荡者会学习各类魔法伎俩来补充自己的其他能力。很多游荡者潜心于潜行与欺诈的技艺，而也有一些则更愿意精修例如攀爬、开锁、寻找和解除陷阱等探索地城的本领。

战斗中，游荡者更喜欢用迅捷而不易察觉的方式袭击敌人，而不是仅依靠纯粹的蛮力。比起胡乱挥拳把敌人打到筋疲力尽，他们更喜欢依靠一次精准的攻击来一招制敌。

有些游荡者是作为罪犯起家的，另一些游荡者则利用自己的狡黠去打击犯罪。但不管一个游荡者与法律的关系究竟如何，没有哪个普通罪犯或执法者能够与那些最伟大的游荡者们的精妙才华相提并论。

成为一名游荡者…

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得游荡者核心特质表里的全部能力。

  • 获得游荡者的1级特性（见游荡者特性表）。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得游荡者核心特质表里的以下能力：生命骰、从游荡者技能熟练表中选择一个技能熟练、盗贼工具熟练和轻甲的护甲受训。

  • 获得游荡者的 1 级特性（见游荡者特性表）。

original:
A Rogue subclass is a specialization that grants you features at certain levels, as specified in the subclass. The next pages present the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeArcaneTric]{Arcane Trickster}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeAssassin00]{Assassin}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeSoulknife0]{Soulknife}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeThief00000]{Thief} subclasses.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.si6movwFtZhNx4q3 caption=false]
translation: 你选择获得一项游荡者子职： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeArcaneTric], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeAssassin00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeSoulknife0] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeThief00000]。子职业的内容见后文。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.Hkz5LQZS0MKSTWoM caption=false classes="three right"]

Enhance Stealth with Arcane Spells

Some Rogues enhance their fine-honed skills of stealth and agility with spells, learning magical tricks to aid them in their trade. Some @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeArcaneTric]{Arcane Tricksters} use their talents as pickpockets and burglars, while others are pranksters.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.Hkz5LQZS0MKSTWoM caption=false classes="three right"]

以奥法咒语匿影藏形

有些游荡者会通过法术来进一步提高自己早已炉火纯青的潜行技艺，并学习各类魔法花招来辅助自己的行当。一些@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeArcaneTric]会利用自己的天赋去帮助自己偷盗或入室行窃，而还有一些诡术师则乐于将掌握的魔法化为恶作剧。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.GcgIi51M6G6QXj6l caption=false classes="three right"]

Practice the Grim Art of Death

An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeAssassin00]{Assassin’s} training focuses on using stealth, poison, and disguise to eliminate foes with deadly efficiency. While some Rogues who follow this path are hired killers, spies, or bounty hunters, the capabilities of this subclass are equally useful for adventurers facing a variety of monstrous enemies.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.GcgIi51M6G6QXj6l caption=false classes="three right"]

践行死亡的不法技艺

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeAssassin00]的训练专注于使用潜行、毒药和伪装来以致命的效率消灭敌人。虽然一些遵循这条路线的盗贼是被雇佣的杀手、间谍或赏金猎人，但这个子职业的能力同样适用于面对各种怪物的冒险者。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.jkA7ZFJd0Brfoor9 caption=false classes="three right"]

Strike Foes with Psionic Blades

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeSoulknife0]{Soulknife} strikes with the mind, cutting through barriers both physical and psychic. These Rogues discover psionic power within themselves and channel it to do their roguish work. As a Soulknife, your psionic abilities might have haunted you since childhood, revealing their full potential only as you experienced the stress of adventure. Or you might have sought out an order of psychic adepts and spent years learning how to manifest your power.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.jkA7ZFJd0Brfoor9 caption=false classes="three right"]

以念为刃屠戮敌手

（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeSoulknife0])者利用心灵的力量来攻击和渗透，击穿阻碍他们的物理和心灵障碍。这些盗贼在体内发现了灵能力量，并利用其来完成他们的老本行。作为一个魂刃者，你的灵能可能从你还是个孩子的时候就一直困扰着你，但直到你在面临冒险的压力时才完全显露潜能。又或者，你可能找到了一个隐居的灵能修士团，花了很多年的时间学习如何显现你的力量。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.DE7Opse8FQcWzA45 caption=false classes="three right"]

Hunt for Treasure as a Classic Adventurer

A mix of burglar, treasure hunter, and explorer, you are the epitome of an adventurer (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeThief00000]{Thief subclass}). In addition to improving your agility and stealth, you gain abilities useful for delving into ruins and getting maximum benefit from the magic items you find there.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.DE7Opse8FQcWzA45 caption=false classes="three right"]

追秘猎宝的经典冒险家。

强盗、宝藏猎人、探险家，你是一切经典冒险者形象的缩影。（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgeThief00000]）不仅提高了你的灵活与隐匿技术，还为你提供了探索古老遗迹的游荡技巧，使你永远能够最大化利用藏匿其中的魔法物品。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.9RyrQV2snF08NjFc caption=false]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.CaXX3GYGe2p3JJ33 caption=false classes="right three"]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrSorcerer00]{Sorcerers} wield innate magic that is stamped into their being. Some Sorcerers can’t name the origin of their power, while others trace it to strange events in their personal or family history. The blessing of a dragon or a dryad at a baby’s birth or the strike of lightning from a clear sky might spark a Sorcerer’s gift. So too might the gift of a deity, exposure to the strange magic of another plane of existence, or a glimpse into the inner workings of reality. Whatever the origin, the result is an indelible mark on the Sorcerer, a churning magic that can be passed down through generations.

Sorcerers don’t learn magic; the raw, roiling power of magic is part of them. The essential art of a Sorcerer is learning to harness and channel that innate magic, allowing the Sorcerer to discover new and staggering ways to unleash their power. As Sorcerers master their innate magic, they grow more attuned to its origin, developing distinct powers that reflect its source.

Sorcerers are rare. Some family lines produce exactly one Sorcerer in every generation, but most of the time, the talents of sorcery appear as a fluke. People who have this magical power soon discover that it doesn’t like to stay quiet. A Sorcerer’s magic wants to be wielded.

Becoming a Sorcerer …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Sorcerer Traits table.

  • Gain the Sorcerer’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Sorcerer Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the Hit Point Die from the Core Sorcerer Traits table.

  • Gain the Sorcerer’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Sorcerer Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.9RyrQV2snF08NjFc caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrSorcerer00]操纵着已经深深刻入他们存在之中的天生法术。一些术士不知道自己力量的起源，另一些则将自己的力量与家族或个人遇到的奇异事件关联起来。巨龙的恩赐，婴儿出生时在场的树精，抑或晴空万里时被闪电劈中，都可能激活术士的天赋。神祇的赠礼，暴露于奇异魔法之下，或是朝着现实原理的一瞥，亦可使术士成为术士。无论术士的起源如何，它都会在术士身上留下不可磨灭的印记——一股可传承千秋万代的汹涌魔力。

术士不学习魔法，翻腾的原始魔力是他们与生俱来的一部分。术士需要掌握的必要能力就是学习如何掌控和引导自己的天生魔法，使其有机会发现全新而令人惊异的魔力放出方式。随着术士逐渐精于控制他们的天生魔法，他们自身也与其本源更加协调，发展出与其力量之源相称的独特威能。

术士非常稀少。一些家族每一代只会出现正好一名术士，但更多时候，术法之才的现世只是偶然。拥有此种魔力的人会很快发现它一点都不安稳——术士的魔法在渴求着释放。

成为一名术士…

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得术士核心特质表中的所有特质。

  • 获得术士的1级特性，如术士特性表中所示。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得术士核心特质表中的生命值骰特质。

  • 获得术士的1级特性，如术士特性表中所示。参见第2章的兼职规则决定你的可用法术位。

original:
A Sorcerer subclass is a specialization that grants you features at certain levels, as specified in the subclass. The next pages present the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrAberrantSo]{Aberrant Sorcery}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrClockworkS]{Clockwork Sorcery}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrDraconicSo]{Draconic Sorcery}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrWildMagicS]{Wild Magic Sorcery} subclasses.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.Sc9DhurPdmkq4ole]
translation: 你获得一个你选择的术士子职。 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrAberrantSo], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrClockworkS], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrDraconicSo] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrWildMagicS]。在后文职业描述之后详述。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.V5olgMSrd0Zacz0K caption=false classes="three right"]

Wield Unnatural Psionic Power

An alien influence has wrapped its tendrils around your mind, giving you psionic power (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrAberrantSo]{Aberrant Sorcery} subclass). You can now touch other minds with that power and alter the world around you. Will this power shine from you as a hopeful beacon to others? Or will you be a terror to those who feel the stab of your mind?

Perhaps a psychic wind from the Astral Plane carried psionic energy to you, or you were exposed to the Far Realm’s warping influence. Alternatively, you were implanted with a mind flayer tadpole, but your transformation into a mind flayer never occurred; now the tadpole’s psionic power is yours. However you acquired this power, your mind is aflame with it.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.V5olgMSrd0Zacz0K caption=false classes="three right"]

操弄非自然的灵能力量 Wield Unnatural Psionic Power

一种异域的影响已经缠住你的心智，赐予了你灵能力量（子职 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrAberrantSo]）。现在你可以使用这种力量触碰他人心智，并扭转现实。这种力量会成为他人的希望灯塔？还是会让那些体会到你心灵刺痛的人感到恐惧？

也许来自星界的心灵风暴携着灵能洗刷了你，又或者你暴露在遥远国度的扭曲影响下。甚至，你可能是被植入了一只夺心魔蝌蚪，但你并没有变成夺心魔；现在蝌蚪的心灵力量归你所有。无论你是如何获得这种力量的，你的灵能心智自此被点燃。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.H0eF1w5Ar7ksQI98 caption=false classes="three right"]

Channel Cosmic Forces of Order

The cosmic force of order has suffused you with magic. That power arises from Mechanus or a realm like it—a plane of existence shaped entirely by clockwork efficiency. You or someone from your lineage might have become entangled in the machinations of modrons, the orderly beings who inhabit Mechanus. Perhaps your ancestor even took part in the Great Modron March. Whatever its origin within you, the power of order can seem strange to others, but for you, it’s part of a vast and glorious system (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrClockworkS]{Clockwork Sorcery} subclass).
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.H0eF1w5Ar7ksQI98 caption=false classes="three right"]

引导寰宇的秩序之力

宇宙的秩序力量已经用魔法渗透了你。这种力量来自于机械境或类似的地方——一个完全由钟表齿轮运转的位面。你或你的血统中的人可能已经卷入了魔冢的远大计划中，魔冢是居住在机械境的秩序生物。也许你的祖先以某种方式参加了伟大的魔冢远征。不管你体内的这种力量起源于何处，机械境的力量对于其他人可能显得陌生而怪异，但对你来说那是他人所无法理解的宏大和璀璨的系统的一部分（子职 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrClockworkS]）。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.bJx0jRA0yw5VQH8U caption=false classes="three right"]

Breathe the Magic of Dragons

Your innate magic comes from the gift of a dragon. Perhaps an ancient dragon facing death bequeathed some of its magical power to you or your ancestor. You might have absorbed magic from a site infused with dragons’ power. Or perhaps you handled a treasure taken from a dragon’s hoard that was steeped in draconic power. Or you might have a dragon for an ancestor (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrDraconicSo]{Draconic Sorcery} subclass).
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.bJx0jRA0yw5VQH8U caption=false classes="three right"]

吐纳巨龙魔法

你的天赋魔法源于龙族的魔力。也许一条远古龙在将死之际把自己部分魔力遗留给了你的先祖，也有可能你是从一个注入了龙之魔力的地方吸取得来，还有一种可能是你触碰到了出土于龙穴，浸入龙族力量的珍宝，甚至你的祖先就是龙也说不定(子职 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrDraconicSo])。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.oVr588YdgC7sUNmD caption=false classes="three right"]

Unleash Chaotic Magic

Your innate magic stems from the forces of chaos that underlie the order of creation. You or an ancestor might have endured exposure to raw magic, perhaps through a planar portal leading to Limbo or the Elemental Planes. Perhaps you were blessed by a fey being or marked by a demon. Or your magic could be a fluke with no apparent cause. Whatever its source, this magic churns within you, waiting for any outlet (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrWildMagicS]{Wild Magic Sorcery} subclass).
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.oVr588YdgC7sUNmD caption=false classes="three right"]

Unleash Chaotic Magic

释放混沌魔力

你天生的魔力来自于与创生之秩序相生相对的混沌之狂野力量。你也许曾经暴露于某种形式的原生魔力中；也许你穿越了一扇传送门到达了混沌海，元素位面，或者神秘的遥远国度。也许你受一名强大的精类生物祝福，或被一个恶魔选中；又或许你的魔力仅仅是天生如此，没有任何明确的原因。无论事情如何发生，这种混乱的魔力已经在你体内翻涌，随时等待着释放（子职 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbscrWildMagicS]）。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.IwQ9ZXbNnPbNVcWH caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkWarlock000]{Warlocks} quest for knowledge that lies hidden in the fabric of the multiverse. They often begin their search for magical power by delving into tomes of forbidden lore, dabbling in invocations meant to attract the power of extraplanar beings, or seeking places of power where the influence of these beings can be felt. In no time, each Warlock is drawn into a binding pact with a powerful patron. Drawing on the ancient knowledge of beings such as angels, archfey, demons, devils, hags, and alien entities of the Far Realm, Warlocks piece together arcane secrets to bolster their own power.

Warlocks view their patrons as resources, as means to the end of achieving magical power. Some Warlocks respect, revere, or even love their patrons; some serve their patrons grudgingly; and some seek to undermine their patrons even as they wield the power their patrons have given them.

Once a pact is made, a Warlock’s thirst for knowledge and power can’t be slaked with mere study. Most Warlocks spend their days pursuing greater power and deeper knowledge, which typically means some kind of adventure.

Becoming a Warlock …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Warlock Traits table.

  • Gain the Warlock’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Warlock Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Warlock Traits table: Hit Point Die and training with Light armor.

  • Gain the Warlock’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Warlock Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.IwQ9ZXbNnPbNVcWH caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkWarlock000] 追寻隐于多元宇宙之下的知识。为了追寻魔法力量，起初他们会钻研大量的禁忌学识，进而知晓了吸引异界存在注目的法术，或者是便是寻觅到了能感受到异界存在的力量之地。在此之后，契术士便会与一位强大的宗主签下被束缚的契约。汲取来自天使，至高妖精，恶魔，魔鬼，鬼婆甚至遥远国度外星存在的远古学识，魔契师将这些奥法之秘拼凑起来，进而转为自己的力量。

魔契师认为他们的宗主只是一种资源，是他们获得魔法力量的手段。有些魔契师尊重、敬畏甚至热爱他们的宗主；有些人则并不那么情愿为他们的宗主服务；有些人则尝试削弱他们的宗主，即使他们所操弄的力量正是来自于他们的宗主。

一旦签下契约，魔契师对知识和力量的渴求便难以仅通过学习来满足。大部分魔契师毕生都在追求更卓越的力量和更深邃的知识，而这往往通向一条冒险之路。

成为魔契师…

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“魔契师核心特质”表中的所有特质。

  • 获得“魔契师特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“魔契师核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰和轻甲训练。

  • 获得“魔契师特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。请参阅第 2 章的兼职规则来确定可用的法术位。

original: A Warlock subclass is a specialization that grants you features at certain levels, as specified in the subclass. The next pages present the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkArchfeyPat]{Archfey Patron}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkCelestialP]{Celestial Patron}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkFiendPatro]{Fiend Patron}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkGreatOldOn]{Great Old One Patron} subclasses.
translation: 你选择获得一项魔契师子职： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkArchfeyPat], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkCelestialP], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkFiendPatro] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkGreatOldOn]。子职的内容见后文。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.yLL5lQDuwybWHdR3 caption=false classes="three right"]

Bargain with Whimsical Fey

Your pact draws on the power of the Feywild. When you choose this subclass, you might make a deal with an archfey, such as the Prince of Frost; the Queen of Air and Darkness, ruler of the Gloaming Court; Titania of the Summer Court; or an ancient hag. Or you might call on a spectrum of Fey, weaving a web of favors and debts. Whoever they are, your patron is often inscrutable and whimsical (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkArchfeyPat]{Archfey Patron} subclass).
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.yLL5lQDuwybWHdR3 caption=false classes="three right"]

与喜怒无常的妖精交易

你的契约从妖精荒野，神秘的妖精国度处取得力量。当你选择此子职业时，你可能与某个强大的至高妖精签订了契约，比如霜冻亲王；薄暮王庭之主，空暗女王；仲夏王庭的泰坦尼亚；苍翠之王奥伯龙；愚者亲王希尔萨姆；你可能是与众多妖精们共处，结成一道好感与人情交织的复杂网络。你宗主的行为往往难以理解，有时甚至不可理喻，而其动机通常是关于寻求更强魔力，或是渴望报复老旧仇怨（子职 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkArchfeyPat]）。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.0ODzCQ4DDHMYzAqQ caption=false classes="three right"]

Call on the Power of the Heavens

Your pact draws on the Upper Planes, the realms of everlasting bliss. You might enter an agreement with an empyrean, a couatl, a sphinx, a unicorn, or another heavenly entity. Or you might call on numerous such beings as you pursue goals aligned with theirs. Your pact allows you to experience a hint of the holy light that illuminates the multiverse (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkCelestialP]{Celestial Patron} subclass).
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.0ODzCQ4DDHMYzAqQ caption=false classes="three right"]

呼唤天堂诸界之伟力

你的契约从众上层位面，极乐永驻之地处取得力量。当你选择此子职业时，你可能与一位至高天，一条羽蛇，一只斯芬克斯，一匹独角兽，或其它与之相似的和那些领域有着联系存在达成协议。或者，你结识了众多与你目的一致的这些天界生物。你的契约令你沐浴在照亮多元宇宙的圣洁辉光之下（子职 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkCelestialP]）。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.hBj1dxfsrtTE3qET caption=false classes="three right"]

Make a Deal with the Lower Planes

Your pact draws on the Lower Planes, the realms of perdition. You might forge a bargain with a demon lord such as Demogorgon or Orcus; an archdevil such as Asmodeus; or a pit fiend, balor, yugoloth, or night hag that is especially mighty. That patron’s aims are evil—the corruption or destruction of all things, ultimately including you—and your path is defined by the extent to which you strive against those aims (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkFiendPatro]{Fiend Patron} subclass).
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.hBj1dxfsrtTE3qET caption=false classes="three right"]

和下层位面之物签订契约

你的契约从众下层位面——诸类邪魔之乡处取得力量。当你选择此子职业时，你可能完成了一次交易——对方可能是一位恶魔领主，诸如狄魔高根，奥喀斯；一位大魔鬼，诸如阿斯蒙蒂斯；亦可能是一位极为强大的深狱炼魔，巴洛炎魔，尤格罗斯魔，甚至是夜鬼婆。无论如何，你的宗主的目标都是邪恶的——邪魔们追求着世间万物的堕落与毁灭，而最终连你本身也无法独善其身（子职 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkFiendPatro]）。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.GlIQYJVBy6ndD6La caption=false classes="three right"]

Unearth Forbidden Lore of Ineffable Beings

When you choose this subclass, you might bind yourself to an unspeakable being from the Far Realm or an elder god—a being such as Tharizdun, the Chained God; Zargon, the Returner; Hadar, the Dark Hunger; or Great Cthulhu. Or you might invoke several entities without yoking yourself to one. The motives of these beings are incomprehensible, and the Great Old One might be indifferent to your existence. But the secrets you’ve learned nevertheless allow you to draw strange magic from it (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkGreatOldOn]{Great Old One Patron} subclass).
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.GlIQYJVBy6ndD6La caption=false classes="three right"]

洞见不可名状的存在与知识

当你选择此子职业时，你可能缚身遥远国度中的不可名状之存在，或是只在传说中出现过的失落古神——诸如潜伏者关纳德；受缚之神萨瑞兹顿；暗夜巨蛇丹德尔；归来者扎贡；伟大克苏鲁；或是其它不可观测的冷漠存在。或者，你靠着骇异的学识祈唤众多此等存在之名，并择取一位，与之结合。此等存在行为无法让凡人理解，这些旧日支配者可能完全没有意识到你的存在，或是对你的存在无动于衷——但你所学的神秘知识让你得以从其身上获得魔法（子职 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkGreatOldOn]）。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.PL7bJ0pKJowitAfU caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdWizard0000]{Wizards} are defined by their exhaustive study of magic’s inner workings. They cast spells of explosive fire, arcing lightning, subtle deception, and spectacular transformations. Their magic conjures monsters from other planes of existence, glimpses the future, or forms protective barriers. Their mightiest spells change one substance into another, call meteors from the sky, or open portals to other worlds.

Most Wizards share a scholarly approach to magic. They examine the theoretical underpinnings of magic, particularly the categorization of spells into schools of magic. Renowned Wizards such as Bigby, Tasha, Mordenkainen, and Yolande have built on their studies to invent iconic spells now used across the multiverse.

The closest a Wizard is likely to come to an ordinary life is working as a sage or lecturer. Other Wizards sell their services as advisers, serve in military forces, or pursue lives of crime or domination.

But the lure of knowledge calls even the most unadventurous Wizards from the safety of their libraries and laboratories and into crumbling ruins and lost cities. Most Wizards believe that their counterparts in ancient civilizations knew secrets of magic that have been lost to the ages, and discovering those secrets could unlock the path to a power greater than any magic available in the present age.

Becoming a Wizard …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Wizard Traits table.

  • Gain the Wizard’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Wizard Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the Hit Point Die from the Core Wizard Traits table.

  • Gain the Wizard’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Wizard Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.n1xrSQG1U8RQ4vJj]

Expanding and Replacing a Spellbook

The spells you add to your spellbook as you gain levels reflect your ongoing magical research, but you might find other spells during your adventures that you can add to the book. You could discover a Wizard spell on a Spell Scroll, for example, and then copy it into your spellbook.

Copying a Spell into the Book. When you find a level 1+ Wizard spell, you can copy it into your spellbook if it’s of a level you can prepare and if you have time to copy it. For each level of the spell, the transcription takes 2 hours and costs 50 GP. Afterward you can prepare the spell like the other spells in your spellbook.

Copying the Book. You can copy a spell from your spellbook into another book. This is like copying a new spell into your spellbook but faster, since you already know how to cast the spell. You need spend only 1 hour and 10 GP for each level of the copied spell.

If you lose your spellbook, you can use the same procedure to transcribe the Wizard spells that you have prepared into a new spellbook. Filling out the remainder of the new book requires you to find new spells to do so. For this reason, many wizards keep a backup spellbook.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.PL7bJ0pKJowitAfU caption=false]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdWizard0000]以他们对魔法内在运作机理的详尽研究而著称。他们施展的法术既可以化为爆焰、电弧，亦可以进行微妙欺瞒与壮丽转化。他们的魔法可以从其他存在位面咒唤怪物，预见未来，或形成防护屏障。他们最强大的法术可以将一种物质转化为另一种，从天空召来流星，抑或打开通往其他世界的大门。

大多数法师将魔法当作学术研究。他们研究魔法的理论基础，特别是诸法术学派的分类。在此基础上，像毕格比 Bigby，塔莎 Tasha，魔邓肯 Mordenkainen，和悠兰德 Yolande一样的著名法师发明了他们的标志性法术，这些法术至今仍在被多元宇宙各处的施法者使用。

贤者或讲师可能是法师最接近平凡的生活。其他法师则充当提供有偿服务的顾问，在军队中服役，或是致力于以犯罪与支配为生。

然而，即使是最不喜冒险的法师也会因知识的诱惑走出安全的实验室和图书馆，一头扎进失落的城市和遗迹。大多数法师相信他们古代文明的同行知晓失落于时间长河中的魔法之秘，而发现这些秘密则会解锁通往力量之路，当代的任何魔法都无法与之匹敌。

成为一名法师…

作为1级角色

  • 获得法师核心特质表中的所有特质。

  • 获得法师的1级特性，如法师特性表中所示。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得法师核心特质表中的生命骰特质。

  • 获得法师的1级特性，如法师特性表中所示。参见第2章的兼职规则决定你的可用法术位。

original:
A Wizard subclass is a specialization that grants you features at certain levels, as specified in the subclass. The next pages present the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdAbjurer000]{Abjurer}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdDiviner000]{Diviner}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdEvoker0000]{Evoker}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdIllusionis]{Illusionist} subclasses.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.rU3ZOyOp2VugnZM2 caption=false]
translation: 你获得一个你选择的法师子职。 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdAbjurer000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdDiviner000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdEvoker0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdIllusionis]。子职的内容见后文。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.M8tgQdPBaQ7jyCqk caption=false classes="three right"]

Shield Companions and Banish Foes

Your study of magic is focused on spells that block, banish, or protect—ending harmful effects, banishing evil influences, and protecting the weak. Abjurers are sought when baleful spirits require exorcism, when locations must be guarded against magical spying, and when portals to other planes of existence must be closed. Adventuring parties value @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdAbjurer000]{Abjurers} for the protection they provide against a variety of hostile magic and other attacks.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.M8tgQdPBaQ7jyCqk caption=false classes="three right"]

保卫同伴，放逐仇敌

你对魔法的研究集中在阻挡、驱逐和保护的法术上——结束有害影响、消除邪恶影响和保护弱者。防护师能够驱逐恶灵、于重要地点防范魔法窥视、关闭通往其他存在位面的门扉。防护师对冒险队伍非常有价值，因为他们能够从各种敌对魔法和其他攻击中保护同伴。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.hzwogHc8FgJFXMmX caption=false classes="three right"]

Learn the Secrets of the Multiverse

The counsel of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdDiviner000]{Diviner} is sought by those who want a clearer understanding of the past, present, and future. As a Diviner, you strive to part the veils of space, time, and consciousness. You work to master spells of discernment, remote viewing, supernatural knowledge, and foresight.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.hzwogHc8FgJFXMmX caption=false classes="three right"]

探究多元宇宙之秘

那些寻求对过去、现在和未来有更清晰了解的人会寻求预言师的建议。作为一位预言师，你致力于揭开空间、时间与意识的面纱。你努力掌握的法术囊括识别能力、千里眼、超自然学识和预警等内容。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.kFstrFfYAMz5QZmV caption=false classes="three right"]

Create Explosive Elemental Effects

Your studies focus on magic that creates powerful elemental effects such as bitter cold, searing flame, rolling thunder, crackling lightning, and burning acid. Some @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdEvoker0000]{Evokers} find employment in military forces, serving as artillery to blast armies from afar. Others use their power to protect others, while some seek their own gain.
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.kFstrFfYAMz5QZmV caption=false classes="three right"]

轰天震地元素奥能

你专注于研习以魔力创造威力惊人的元素力量，诸如苦寒、灼焰、惊雷、汲电和烈酸。一些塑能师会接受军队的雇佣，充当从远处轰炸敌人的炮兵。其他人以其惊人力量保护弱小，另一些人则作为冒险者寻求自身的利益。

original:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.rDfM6y3Au4DQ9HS3 caption=false classes="three right"]

Weave Subtle Spells of Deception

You specialize in magic that dazzles the senses and tricks the mind, and the illusions you craft make the impossible seem real (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdIllusionis]{Illusionist} subclass).
translation:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCh3ArtHandout.JournalEntryPage.rDfM6y3Au4DQ9HS3 caption=false classes="three right"]

编织精妙的欺瞒法术。

你专精于能扰乱感官、迷惑心灵的魔法，而你创造的幻象足够以假乱真 (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwzdIllusionis])。
